Review: I'm worried about the quality of the shirt. it looks like it may snag easily. i've decided to keep it, so hopefully i will get some use out of it. in hindsight i would have not bought it when considering the price and quality of the shirt.

One wash wonder...i'm a s to m and went with a m but could have gone with a s with ease. after washing it was way shorter. it shrunk more than a whole size in cold water! i assumed everything came preshrunk but sadly disappointed. great for one wear.
nice but kinda too long n shrinks easily
It took a long time to get, but it was worth it.  It is a fantastic product.  But it is advertised as suit separates, with no link on how to buy the pants.

This dress was too cute to pass up! i loved it online but when i got it home, it was so tight i couldn't zip up my normal size. the length was perfect on me being 5'7". the fabric and detail was beautiful. if you have a bust, order a size up. beautiful dress just really snug up top.
My husband does lawn care and prefers thin, cool, waterproof pants. While this meets all those standards, they are literally see through and he cannot wear them.

Loved this top on model. even happier when it went on sale. sort of boxy. but still excited, then within one day there was hole already in the thin tee fabric! disappointed. my other tees i purchased are fine.
Bought these for my daughter in size XL. They did not fit. My daughter wears a youth XL in everything, including the Nike Vapor softball pants she's currently wearing.
Very cute everyday tee. usually run between an xs or small with retailer and was happy i chose the extra small. a great updated on a classic strip tee.
This shirt fits much better than I expected. It laundered well, very few wrinkles, and the color doesn't fade.
I cant say I recommend it.

The smallest size, xs, was big on me, i was overwhelmed by the sweater. it is a bit of swing shape, doesn't hug the body. sleeves are interesting though, but not flattering on a petite frame. color is a pretty green, made me think of wintergreens. fabric may be itchy to some. just ok for me.

for reference xs bog on 115 lbs, 30dd, 26.5 in waist.

I guess I'll have to hem them, but there's a cute trim at the bottom of the legs that I'll lose once I do that.  I haven't washed them yet, so maybe they'll shrink a bit, but I doubt it will take a foot off the length.
Honestly... this couldn't fail and it didn't

Does not look like the picture. I will give them credit for the product arriving considerably earlier than promised. Not sure how to describe what it looked like, but it was much puffier than the picture and the nubby material was very sticky - for lack of a better word. Everything stuck to it. Only had it on for a few moments and pretty sure that every dog hair and piece of fuzz on the plant was stuck to it! Returned!
This runs way big, i'm a size 8, purchased the medium. it's just big with no shape.

The sweater in the picture is not the sweater I received. The sweater in the pic looks like a thicker m/heavier cotton. I received thin, see through cotton. It was a gift for my daughter & us passed the return date.

I loved this shirt when i got it. it fit perfectly, and was so soft. but when i washed it, following the instructions, it shrank up to well above my belly button. i'm talking 6 inches of shrinkage, at least.
Beautiful but I did not choose the correct size.

Ordered this vest in both the xs and pxs. i liked the length and overall fit of the xs, however, i ended up returning both due to how the vest draped. the outer fabric is a bit more stiff which made the vest balloon out more then what i liked. overall, it?s not a terrible vest but just not for me.
Cute shirt but if you are busty, the v-neck pulls apart very oddly. The material was solid and not sheer.

This sweater has a fun big bold flower and a nice blue color and is quite roomy. the fit is larger around the arms and chest, which might work well for people who are very curvy on top. it seems to taper a bit to the waist. the roomy fit to the arms gives it almost a bat wing shape. it was too overwhelming on my petite frame, what with the bold flower and the fit, so i passed. but if you like the big flower and color and want a roomy sweater, this could work well for you.

This blouse has too much drapey fabric and it's just not flattering.  in the front part of the blouse the fabric is relatively short, but the sleeves have so much excess fabric it almost looks like a clown suit.  sending back.
I normally wear an extra large however Amazon recommended extra extra large in this shirt. That’s what I ordered and it fits perfectly
Very poor quality. I was super excited to get this shirt for my new job. Threw it right back in the bag. Looks very cheap.
So many wrinkles! Ironed and ironed and still wrinkly.
Took forever. Thinest fabric I've ever seen.

I purchased the medium in this sweater as that was all that was left. but it fit like a large if not an xlarge! it's a beautifully made sweater and really soft. i now think i know why it suddenly becomes available again here and there. it's not the kind of sweater you want to wear over sized because as beautifully made as it is, it's not that flattering if it's hanging on you. luckily it suddenly became available in a small which i quickly ordered and will keep my figures crossed that it's bette

These got me so excited for fall. the teal is a color i'm really into right now and was the real reason i decided to order these. when they arrived though, i was delighted to find that they are light weight and have the perfect amount of stretch. the fit is snug, but hugs all the right places and are so comfortable! these will be a staple in my wardrobe. i want to order more colors!

I have been eyeing this piece for months now! i broke down and bought it when they finally had my size in stock. i am 5 '4 and 110 lbs and have a very small chest so i ordered an xs. i think the top is too baggy for me. yes, the top and bottoms fit overall, but it doesn't look as nice and form fitting like it does on the model. it is very sheer--which is the thing that discourages me the most. i love the concept of this piece but the execution could use some work, which i am willing to work on s

I'm 5'7”, 175 pounds, and was unsure of my size due to recent weight loss.I ordered a 12 and a 14, assuming one of the two would be a good fit. Nope.The 12s came up higher on my waist than the 14s, which was strange but I liked the height. They felt comfortable but were snug all over and the material is too thin to wear snug, they looked painted on.The 14s, strangely, were a lower cut than the 12s. Shorter and wider because the legs and hips fit well... The thin fabric looked nice that loose but the waist band was wide and asking for a belt and the legs had so much extra fabric that they bunched up when I walked.Trying to choose which I would wear in public was frustrating and in the end I decided to return both.Still giving a few stars because odd fit aside the fabric was stretchy and comfortable, the stitching seemed good quality, and the style is cute. Nice for those who fit the cut.
Waist to small

This top is beautiful to look at but did not fit me like the model. it was tight across the bust but very poofy at the bottom, which normally i like, but not this time. sad.

I loved these pants the minute i put them on, and was so happy i'd ordered them. but i wore them only 3 times - and only at dinners with friends, not even for full days - and the seams on both legs ripped open! i think the faux leather just isn't equipped to handle the stretch of fitted leggings. i was super-bummed about this, because these pants are so insanely cute. but if they can't hold up to a few casual wears, then there's just no way... thankfully retailer was true to their brilliant custom

This shirt has an incredible softness to it and the purple print is so lovely, i did end up returning it simply because the flowiness was a bit too much for me. i had tried the 2 and 4 and went with the 4 due to arm restrictions in the smaller size. too bad because it really is a lovely top. definitely worth a try in store!

I intentionally searched for Bamboo, linen, or cotton PJs. It is almost impossible to get the correct items even if the search criteria is specific! I absolutely hate this abt Amazon! They truly don't vet their vendors/suppliers and/or don't care abt all the false or misleading, well down right lying/deceiving customers. I usually check the details on items, but it was late and I've been desperately searching for material that breathes due to medical issues. So I just got these, tried them on first thing and before washing them, checked the labels...95% polyester AND of course made in China. I'm going to make an effort to find made in the US or ANY place other than China. I cannot understand why we still do ANY biz with China. Now all that being said, the PJs fit perfect. Cursory look, material/pattern is nice. Very soft. But dang, mislead.
This shirt runs very large. i will be returning for a smaller size.

I was hesitant to try this on because honestly, it looked so short. however, i just bought this at my retailer store and it is very flattering on! 1st of all, it runs big. my normal size (12) was way too big and i had to go down a size. i could have gone down 2 sizes but the length became problematic. in my regular size (that was too big), the skirt hit me a few inches above my knee. perfect! in the size smaller, it was a tad higher; wish it was the same longer length as the 12 but still acceptabl

The jacket was too big and the pants only fit in the thighs. My son was able to wear the pants with a belt and the vest fit perfectly. Before the night was over the pants split coin the crouch area. I would not recommend anyone that have thick thighs to purchase this suit. My son normally wears a 36 and i purchased a 2xl thinking that he would be able to fit it.

I bought this suit based on the great reviews. i was so bummed when i tried it on. the top fit so well but the bottom kept bunching up. my torso is on the longer side so maybe that's why the bottoms keep coming up. every time i pulled the shorts down, the top would come down too, and vice versa. i am 5'5 and 120lbs and bought a 2 which is my normal size. i did like that the top had a bit of padding but that's the extent of what i liked about it. i will be returning it.

This is definitely a personal preference review. i loved this dress when i tried it on. it's really beautiful. however, there was just way too much fabric on the sleeves for me. i know it's the style and i have similar style dresses, but i felt really large in this dress and it all came down to the sleeves for me.

I love the vest and have worn it a lot, perfect for early spring weather here in the mid-west.  It is a nice weight and exactly what I wanted. Note that others have noted the elastic finished edge on the arm opening as it does give it a less polished look. I have sewing skills and I did "take" it in a bit under the armpit area. I was able to make it less "bunchy" looking and more polished.  It still has the elastic trim but I was happy I could alter as the vest was exactly what I wanted.  Fits nice and great weight and pockets.
Great pair of jeans

I ordered this top online in two colors, and kept the berry color. i liked it while trying it on. when i wore it an entire day, the top just didn't look that good. it wasn't flattering, and it focused on the bad areas despite being loose fitting. it didn't seem very flattering. i wore it for one day and am not happy with my purchase. i wish i could send it back but i already wore it. the fit just isn't very flattering. it is loose but focuses on the curves not in a good way if you are curvy.
Just know that the shirt is a regular vneck t-shirt  ,it is just tucked into shorts

I was so excited to receive this top!!! the material and design is gorgeous but it is way way way too short!!! i'm 5'7" with an hourglass shape/average build and it barely hit the top of my pants! it otherwise fit true to size. so disappointed!!!! and for the price, it really should be cut better.

As soon as my eyes touched these pants i knew my body had to. not only doo they look great, they feel great. the material is very soft with just enough stretch. they've quickly become my favorites. i loved the first pair so much i immediately bought the other color.

These are WAY WAY WAY smaller than what they say.  I wear 18 and these wear more like 12's I couldn't come close to buttoning them.  I read other reviews and they claimed that the pants were big but that was not the case for me.  Returning

I ordered this in lime, which is one of my fave colors. the garment was loose and roomy, and had the designer used elastic anywhere on the waist, i would have been in love! the shoulders were only tight due to the lack of flexibility in the bottom - no elastic at the waist and no placket below the waist to increase the ease of mobility taking the garment on and off - so if i had to use the ladies' room, i had to plan ahead. 

i took it on a trip and didn't have time to try on prior to leaving.

I bought this top in the blue motif and loved it so so very much until i washed it. it came out of the wash (delicate/cold cycle) with 3 small holes. i am devastated because it was destined to be my favorite top for summer. it is flattering, lightweight, gorgeous color, cool raw edges, v-back detail...i could go on and on about all the things i love about this top, but now it has holes after one washing so it's all for naught. do-over please with better fabric qa.

These are cute for price. I sized up to XL as I'd rather shorts be a little big than too small. The XL fits fine - slight gapping in waistline but not bothersome. The leg openings are tight-ish. The inseam seam is not at all stretchy and is very stiff and rigid. The outside of the leg feels stretchy and you can pull them down to 6" length but the inside stitch is so stiff that it prevents you from adjusting them to longer length, which is a bummer for me. Otherwise I'm being picky. They're cute and I'd buy again in another color as long as they stay under $25.

This chemise is so comfortable and beautiful. can be dressed up or down and is a staple of a bohemian wardrobe. gave 4 stars for the fact that it is completely see through and requires a (not included) slip underneath. also because the super thin cotton will wear easily.
I think these are meant for people who are over 6’3”.
Great looking, very comfortable, the only thing I hate is they roll up on the leg after wearing them for awhile.

The tank top fits well. i usually boarded between a large and an xl and i got a large in this shirt which was perfect. it is kind of thin material so i wear a white tank under it. it's not too big in the armpits which is nice so my bra doesn't show. material is really soft and comfortable. it fits loose but not baggy.

This dress could have been great but for me there was too much design on the top part/ front. i wish the neckline was different or just less beadwork/ design near my face.
all in all its a maxi dress and was returned because approx. $250 was too much to spend on this.
Bad fit, bad material, bad feel. Go with another company if you want a pair of slacks worth a damn.
It’s a super cute top but wish it was just a tad bit longer and the material isn’t the best feeling, but still a cute top.
I use this item for my summer outfit. When leaving the house I just threw on a pair, of pants, wore the top as a shirt.
Liked the length.

dislike fabric was not as seen it was thin and looked very cheap i got a large top and it fitted like a extra large could not send back because there was no return label with merchandise so it will get put in the first garage sale for this Fall.
Legs are too wide. the fabric is rough to the touch.
Just too bad to wear
This is an excellent buy.  Nice soft fabric, expected fit, nothing unexpected or wierd in the design.  Great basic everyday summer dress.  Wash and wear too., 👍

I did size up on this one. it came in and it was too snug for a loose shirt. i sized up and i love it now. i went to the store and bought it in white and black. i sized up in the white but not the black. you may want to try them on before purchasing them. i want more.
So the shirt is soft, but it really has no form. If stretched, it stays that way.

It's taken me 4 washes, soaking in borax, soaking in baking soda twice, multiple vinegar baths to get the formaldehyde smell out of these jeans. I should mention that was within the first 48 hours of getting my replacement pair because the first pair was absolutely dreadful. Made the decision to wear them to work after the second wash and the smell was so bad that my lower body smelled exactly like these jeans. Please avoid purchasing Levi's from Amazon unless you want to spend your first week of owning them trying to get the smell out of them. Other than that the first is great but so far that's the only good thing.

The zipper broke on this piece the first time i wore it. very disappointing since i love the design. i'm actually going to try to replace the zipper myself with something stronger, but annoying that it's come to that.
They're a little tight for normal tees, but can be worn as undershirts. Fabric is soft and comfortable.

Wanted the polka dots, but the whites were blue like the colors ran, the sleeves were oddly shaped, and the pants fit and hung like an XXL, instead of a large.

This blazer looked really good and I wanted to keep it, but I wanted pink.  And the color is so NOT pink.  It's orange.  Really disappoining.  I'm returning it and getting the black one for now.  I'll go back and probably order the deep pink.  But beware.  I held this jacket up to many pink things in the house, and outside, and it is so orange, like salmon, not pink.  But the fit was really good and the material is really nice.  I'm 5'8" and 195lbs and got the xl and I was happy with the way it looked.  Just not the color expected at all.
This skirt ran short, small, and boxy. if you can get the right fit, the skirt is great quality and super cute, but i recommend trying on in store for sizing.
I wear an  XXL every day, this shirt would not even button, it was so small!
This is the most flattering shirt--love the fit and color!

This 36 waist is way tighter than all my other clothes. Zipper is rough but smoothed out with lube. Large belt loops accommodate duty belt easily and pockets are generous and well placed. Consider buying a size up.

I saw this dress in a store the other day. it is so cute in real life. i don't think the pictures online even begin to show how cute it is on. the dress is well-made and it fit perfectly. in fact, it is quite flattering. i am so happy i saw it in the store. even though i am big online shopper i would have passed on this dress if i only saw it online, but don't because it is worth every penny.

I like the look of these joggers, but you absolutely need to get a size smaller than you’d normally get.  They are so big, they will fall off of your body and they are way too long.  I’m going to order a size smaller and maybe update this post to see if it was a better fit.
Opened and was excited with material but the v neck thread was all uneven and thread ripped . Returning to see if just manufacturer issue .

The pants are good. However, as others have noted, they smelt very bad after arrival. My wife soaked them in vinegar and water-- still the smell lingered. She washed them in the machine; still smelly. She washed them again in the machine using Dr. Bronner's peppermint soap; the smell was less, but there. Then she left them outside for 1 week. After the air dry, they were better. Then she washed them again and now the smell is finally gone. (P.S. Do not put in dryer until you get the smell out.)
Wasn't crazy about this top. it looked great online but in person it's just a boring and lifeless top.

Wonderful purchase!  The dress is very comfortable.  The high low style was perfect, I'm 5'4" and wore 3" heels.  The dress did not drag on the floor.  Typically wear size 8-10 and I purchased a size Large which fit perfectly.  I didn't want the dress to be too snug and me to appear to be squeezing into it.  Highly recommend this dress!
This dress is true to size, it looks sexy on the model but much more modest in person. great for work!

But if the length fell short, it won’t look as nice.Overall great vest for dressing up kids. Took off a star for the sizing running small.

This is a beautiful blouse. very pretty and looks well made. unfortunately i had to send it back. i'm looking for a more classic cut. it has an a line/tent shape. when i put it on and put my arms above my head, the bottom of the blouse was up to my bra!
i would order from this brand again.

Feel bad for anyone that thinks this is a “nice” shirt. Got the right neck and sleeve lengths, and this body mess of a shirt was looser than [insert joke here]. And the material? Cross between athletic shorts and shower curtain. Time to leave earth in search of a new species.

I debated on which to buy. I analyzed and researched as a plus size person. I’m glad I bought these. Will be looking to buy more.

I got the pilcro hyphen chinos in a size 25p and they fit, so i assumed i would be the same size in the pilcro stet chinos...nope. the 25p was way short and way tight. i'm 5'3" and about 113 lbs. my mom is 5' and 98 lbs and they fit her so i gave the 25p stet chinos to her to keep. disappointed!

Cheap material is being used in Lee Jeans now. I only bought them because I have worn Lee Jeans all my life and have not found another brand that I love the way they fit. I will say this you can depend on the fit of Lee Jeans! I am 65 and have worn Lee Jeans for over 40+ years. I used to be a electric utility lineman and always wore Lee Jeans to work and never had the problem that I have seen in the past 4 or 5 years. I put this brand to the test climbing poles, working in all kinds of weather and they never failed me. Now doing something as simple as putting your finger in a belt loop to pull up your pants causes them to tear away from the jean leaving a hole in the fabric. I have also had a rear pocket to tear the fabric on the seat of the jeans. Note the pictures attached are from the same pair of jeans.

I'm glad i bought this dress with a discount. it's a comfortable staple, but not a showstopper. i love the plush fabric, which has great weight, and the skirt. the top is cut to be a little revealing, which worked well with my full bust but wouldn't be work appropriate. the keyhole at the back is large, but did not reveal my bra.

This is such an easy dress to wear and it looks very polished! it is not a "cheap polyester" fabric as one reviewer wrote. it is a rayon and nylon blend. it does wrinkle easily. i love that the belt is actually sewn into the dress at the back. i don't typically gravitate toward warm color palette, but the burnt orange color is really lovely. it can be dressed up or down very easily. and it has pockets! i typically wear xs in retailer brands, and the size 0 fit me well.
Love it. Super comfortable.

I get the great reviews. these do for me what no jogger could. i have hips. i never thought these would work. they do and they look just as cool on me as the model. i am a 10-12. i could only find a 12 but i think a 10 would be perfect. they are effortlessly cool and casual...for all body types. i'm so excited i tried these on.

Then they will assess if it can be repaired.  They can't show the photos to the assessment team.  Then when they see the hem has dissolved I can have it shipped back to me unrepaired or I can get a credit to buy something else from Columbia.  They don't replace defective items.

The pictures tell it all. This xxl blazer is extremely small. I've placed it on top of an xxl blazer I bought from Woman Within.Size numbers tell you nothing. I sure hope they do it, and it starts a trend. It is VERY hard to buy clothes online, and returns are never easy.To end on a positive note, the blazer is super-cute. The days when Lee was a less expensive Dockers equivalent are gone. I bought every color available in my size of this model. Of those, I had to return the grays because they fit significantly tighter than the rest and the browns because the front was literally a different shade of brown from the back. The remainder fit well but have loose threads galore. I've been able to snip the latter off, but this experience is pretty far removed from what I've gotten from the brand and this particular line in years past (2015).If you buy these in more than 1 color, be sure to try on every single pair to ensure they fit the same. Also inspect for loose threads so you don't walk into the office looking like a woolly mammoth.

I ordered the option with the blue shirt and plaid pant, but was sent the red plaid shirt/pant pair. I'm not unhappy with them, other than they are warmer than what I wanted. I would not order them this way again, though.

Okay, i love the blouse this brand has in the same material, so i thought i'd delight in this dress. i am a 5'7" hourglass but have a longer torso. i ordered the large in this, usually a 10 or 12 fits me.. but the waist hit much higher than my natural waist, and yet it was somewhat tight and completely rigid. the bust area was a little loose, and i'm a 36c. then the bottom flared out in sort of a flower fairy poof above my knees which reminded me of a navy blue oompa loompa dress.. and i love my

Initially thrilled to finally have a matching set of pajamas at age 35. No pockets, eh, I’ll just hold stuff… so excited was I that I put them on straight out of the package without laundering them first! There are easy ways to learn a lesson, and then are hard ways… with a day or two I had broken out in a bright red contact dermatitis rash all over my whole body except the head, hands & feet … the only place that the pajamas don’t touch, imagine that! Thickest around the forearms and wasteband line, where the pajamas are tightest against the skin… imagine that! It doesn’t itch, so maybe I should give 2 stars… unresponsive to Benadryl, unresponsive to steroid cream, no fever, no other symptoms, fully vaccinated for measles and already had the chicken pox as a child so… I wonder what gave me the rash, hmm… after 5 days it has not gone away. After I see the DOCTOR on Monday about this sudden *full body* rash, I will gladly update this review if the diagnosis is anything other than nasty-pajama-chemical-induced contact dermatitis. The worst part is that I enjoyed wearing them so much and now I am deathly afraid, even after washing them twice…

I've had great luck with items from sunday in brooklyn & this vest is another fantastic purchase. the color/fit match the photos. the material is so soft. i've worn it quite a bit since i received it and it hasn't pilled. it's washed well too. the braided part can be folded down if you don't want it higher on your neck. it will still lay flat & drape nicely. it's perfect for cold weather. i'd love to see this come out in other colors too.
Got this as a gift for my grandson. Not sure about water resistance or warmth yet but it is a very nice looking jacket.

I'm sure this will probably go away after a few washes, but it startled me at first, because I thought I was having an allergic reaction or something.

I bought these inexpensive Hanes shorts in black, and then ordered another pair in grey. I like to wear casual, comfortable gym type shorts around the house in the warm weather. Truthfully, they aren't particularly flattering, so I wouldn't wear them out at all. They are a French terry sweatshirt material, loose around the legs, with a drawstring waist and side pockets. I'm 5'2" tall, 115 pounds but I have a bigger waist, so I got them in a medium and they fit fine. The length comes to my knees. They wash up well and seem like they will last. The item description says something about rolling them up, but they have a fixed cuff at the bottom so they really can't be rolled. Hanes has some good products that can't be easily found in stores, and this is one of them.

I love the look of this dress & had high hopes, but it didn't live up to them. have no doubt that it is well made & beautiful, fully lined with lovely detailing around the neck. i am 5'6", 155lbs with a postpartum belly that i'd like to hide, so i chose this dress as the reviews say it's a bit loose & forgiving. i found it to be so loose that it looks big & entirely hides my figure! i considered ordering a small, but knew that it was simply the cut of the dress & going down a size wouldn't chang
Stretch of material and light weight

I agree with the other reviewers; this sweater was strangly shaped in the waist, in an unflattering way. the rest of it was beautiful though. looks too much like maternity, even in a petite xs, so it's going back.
Bought a 2x need to go to 3x. Not American sizing.

The dress is beautiful and nice material. However, the neckline is so high that it feels like it’s choking you if you sit down. So I am returning it. I’m sad because if the neckline had a little more room it would be the perfect dress.
Nothing like how the picture looks, very unsatisfied.
The material was thin, showed every lump you'd rather hide and clung to the body. even the sleeves were tight. looked inexpensive.

I saw this top online and had to buy it immediate (which is rare for me). it looked loose and forgiving but had a polished look. it didn't disappoint when i tried it on. however, the straps are a bit loose and will need to be altered. the linen fabric can be rough or itchy, but still a gorgeous top!
This dress is the best casual find. goes with everything- flips flops, tennys, jean jacket. feels little sporty and the orange was a cool addition to my closet.
That does it for me - only buying clothes at a store where I can try them on

The jeans are fine, but the crotch wears out very quickly. The material they are using these days is just too thin to support the normal wear jeans undergo in this area. Jeans used to be rugged and lasted for years. Not anymore!

I agree with the other reviews! perfect color and weight to the dress. should wear well in summer and fall. i'm 5'5'' 34c 140lbs athletic and got the 6 regular. fit well and the length was perfect with flats.

The size was fine, but the material was SO heavy!  As soon as I took it out of the bag, I was thrown by the weight.  Then when I put it on, with the wrap, the weight all fell to the bottom of my body.  It wrapped correctly, but because I am small-chested, this dress looked and felt way too bottom heavy.  I did not like the material at all.
The pants started getting tattered along the pocket edges within a couple of weeks. By week 6 there was a hole in the seat of my pants. Ridiculous.
Unfortunately, this doesn't look as great in person as in pictures. materila looks and feels cheap. Would not repurchase.

This jacket fits just like the Define Jacket from Lululemon . . . . and while Lululemon clothes tend to run a bit small, this one does as well.  When ordering this jacket order at LEAST one size up.  If you want to wear long sleeves as a base layer you should order up 2 sizes.
Color runs even after washing

I love this dress so much...what an excellent purchase! i wear this with white leggins and love the look. this dress has a sheath underneath the flower pattern that is form fitting, which i think is way sexy from the back. the front part of the dress is very flowy and moves nicely. i love the high neck on this piece and the beautiful colors. a wonderful pick up from retailer.
my son is 5'2 115lbs & the large fit perfect.

The title says it all. while the quality was good, when i put this dress on a felt like i was wearing a shapeless sack fashioned out of wallpaper. the length was longer than on the model (makes sense since i am only 5'5"), which was ok, but the overall fit was just too big. i am a size 2 and tried the xs, which was huge. just not flattering or breezy or sexy in any way. going back!

Love this casual and soft flowing top. its a nice loose fit. slightly big, however i'm petite. asymmetrical hem adds a unique touch. pairs well with a variety of denim skinnies...black, dark denim. planning to try with white ankle skinnies as well. the v-neck is just right. dips enough to show the neckline without revealing cleavage. it's the perfect lightweight layer for spring to fall. i even added a black blazer for a cool evening out. love this top and would buy in other colors.

I like dresses with sleeves as those are more appropriate for work for me. this dress is a smooth material and the asymmetrical bottom adds just a little extra something. i got it in my normal size and i do find it looser/not meant to be body hugging again making it work appropriate.
I'm petite, but even if i weren't, i think this runs very large, isn't form flattering at all, and overall looks dull. it most definitely does not justify the price. material is thin.

From quality, to design, and overall comfort...these leggings have it all. they are so so soft and feel and look amazing on. i bought the black and i love the ribbed detailing. it's just enough to add a little something. i ended up buying the other two colors and another pair of black! for the price it's more than worth it.
poorly made

After just two washing the stitching on the rear pockets began to unravel and the seems on the outer thigh began to fray.They faded a lot as well. Though I like faded jeans, the rate they faded just helps prove their poor quality.
Ordered this cover up in a mp but it was waaay too big so now waiting for the sp to arrive! hope its a hit!

Ordered the green floral print (I already own this blouse in teal, which I am very happy with). As another reviewer noted, the fabric of the new blouse resembles a cheap outdoor table cloth. It is printed on one side only, slides all over the place and makes a weird rustling sound. I don't believe this fabric is intended for wearing.

I'm 5'3" and 120 lbs. i ordered a m and it was far too boxy and long in the arms as well as the back. the collar is small and lays flat. the material is good quality and soft but heavier than i had hoped.
These pants are worth what you pay for them. But they’re slightly see through and the fabric starts to get loose threads throughout the pants.

Oh how i love this dress! i was worried because i am very busty and sometimes that translated to looking pregnant in swing dresses, but this.... incredible! i am wearing it with either blue strappy sandals or red heels and it is quite the perfect summer dress! the material is thick, and feels elegant, the colors are vibrant. today is my first day wearing it, and i have already received 4 compliments! no kidding! wonderful! maeve clothing... i love you!
I received only 4 shirts not 5!!
Slightly disappointing. i wanted the picture -- the full-on flare. it has very little flare. that said, they're still comfortable jeans, so i'll keep them.

I thought this shirt was really feminine and elegant. only downsides is some of the punched out holes had fabric still attached which you have cut off with scissors- otherwise the shirt will snag. and the second issue of bigger importance are the low armholes. lots of bra showing- not really sure how to get around that so i always wear it with a cardigan. but it would be nice not to have to. 
other than that it looks nice and pairs nicely with almost anything.

Nice and colorful dress but runs very oversized. material mutes the colors not as vibrant in person.
Comfy, stylish jacket. I’m glad I have it. My only complaint is that the zipper is a little hard to use.
PJs fit my husband very nicely and they wash up well. That is a good thing.

The skiers, cats, and puffin patterns are adorable and i was very tempted to keep the shirts just for the patterns. unfortunately, the fit was awful. i am short and need to highlight my waist and this shirt did the opposite. the skier fabric is also see-through. the tenting issue could be fixed if you belt the shirt or tuck it in, but it is not very long. 100% rayon fabric is a bummer too. the shirt was snug at the bicep, but not as bad as i expected from the reviews. i sized up from an 8 to 10.

When i saw this top online, i thought i'd love it and immediately ordered it in both colors.  they arrived today and i am soooo disappointed.  i have never seen such drab colors.  the blue is a muddy grayish hue (like an overcast day) and the pink is a dusty shade of peach.  yuck.  and i was hoping the ruffle at the bottom would have a chiffon-like flowy effect.  instead, the ruffle is made of a cheap looking knit.  back these go...

There isn't a whole lot that i did like about this dress. the shoulders have large poufs, the fabric isn't very soft, and it's not flattering. maybe with a belt i could be tempted, but i wasn't too fond of the dress.
I am in love with this top! it is so comfortable and lovely. it runs a touch big like most items of this brand.

I was so excited for this dress to come. i am 5'1" and 100lbs so i ordered and xs petite. it was literally falling down around my shoulders and gigantic all around. maybe on someone taller this would have looked great. i was also disappointed that the blue shown online was not accurate. my dress was a much lighter blue. back to the store it goes.
I disliked the quality of the material and it was way to baggy not flattering at all.

This is a good basic casual skirt, and the grayish color is a great neutral. i saw it in store just kind of hanging by itself and decided to try it on. i usually wear a 6 in skirts, but always have to size up in hd so i grabbed an 8, which fit well. i will say it's definitely a little snug though, even sizing up. the fabric is soft and flowy, and will work well for both late summer and early fall. i'd recommend it.

The fabric for this dress is similar to a table cloth that you’d buy from a dollar store.  I buy so much from Amazon in terms of clothes regardless of the seller but this piece was a yikes.

Beautiful pattern and shape! however i had to send it back! it is extremely see through and ran very small! i even sized up and it still pulled in the bust area! maybe someone with a smaller bust might fit them better!

I was excited to receive this top because i love the design, but was very disappointed when it arrived. i thought the embroidery would be striking but it's not. the material is a t-shirt knit which also added to the disappointment. it was not flattering at all.

The shirt is a heavier weight than how it looks on the product page which was a nice surprise. it has a boxy shape and was shorter than expected. i'm 5'7" and the front of the shirt above the hips. the design and color is great. very happy overall.
It’s nice. I wish they cared more about how they package their clothing items

Ok, so I have bought all my Levi wedgies from Nordstrom. I wanted to try these. They are NOT the same fit even though I bought the same style and size. That being said, I think they are Levi’s cheaper line that they make for their outlet and places like Target. I have been to the Levi’s outlet and their wedgies fit like these ones, so I think they are authentic. They have way more stretch to them, way less “denim.” Wedgies fromNordstrom are much more stiff and less stretch, which is what I like since they have less spandex and more denim. That said, I think these are authentic, but lower line Levi’s, which makes sense given the cheaper price. This price is the same as the outlet price. So my recommendation: if you have never had wedgies, you may like these. If you have wedgies from a department store and love them, you won’t like the fit of these at all. I returned mine.

This is literally the most unflattering thing i have ever tried on from retailer. the sleeves are so weird and ugly. they get really fat at the top, like a dolman sleeve, but it looks really strange because they don?t flow into the rest of the top, which is very structured. it made my shoulders look huge even though i have very narrow shoulders. this is not apparent in the model picture at all. the thick black seams at the shoulders are also placed in a really awkward spot which also contri
I’m a normal large or xl. Got this in xl and it is more like a small. Barely fit over my head. Material is itchy polyester too. Going back. Thank goodness for Amazon returns.
I didn't like anything about this sweater.
Love this jacket, comfortable and goes with everything

I’ve been buying the tech 2.0 shorts for years.  They are always longer than I like with the 10” inseam, but these are even longer and wider, and have an almost baggy feel.  The material is light and comfortable.  I wish they’d make more of their tech 2.0 shorts with 8.5 to 9.0 inch inseams, because unfortunately my legs are short.  I’d think these are good for basketball players who prefer really long shorts.  I would have given it 1 star, but they are comfortable like the majority of their other shorts I’ve bought.  Unless you like really long shorts or you’re at least a few inches taller than me where they will look better with more height, I wouldn’t buy these.

I never thought I’d buy clothing on Amazon but, after reading the reviews, I thought what the heck - it’s only ~$20. I liked my yellow color so much that I bought the white with black stripes. I’m 5’8” and the length is great - very flattering for a front tuck. The fluttered sleeves are adorable and having the rib at the bottom finishes it nicely. Also, the V is perfect for stacking necklaces. I may be ordering a third one now…
Great material and fit.  Was perfect for a wedding I attended.
We live in the Pacific Northwest. This coat is only good for about 15 minutes in light rain before it leaks. Heavy rain or any length of time in light rain your kid will be soaked!
I returned this item. it was soft. very blah fabric. nothing special.

Absolutely not even close to the color that was advertised! I ordered the light tan/brown... the color i received is a deep bright chestnut brown. Had i known it would look like this i would not have ordered. Very deceiving in their advertising

I purchased a set of these as a companion to another brand of work pants. I was disappointed in the quality, I put the first set on and halfway through the day the top button popped off at work. This made the rest of the day uncomfortable. I did not give the second set a chance but sewed the button back on the first set and gave them to Goodwill.  I cannot recommend the purchase but if your body runs on the thin side these may work for you.

I purchased this sweater in red, it's a deep, rich color and although i usually opt for black, you can see the beautiful details on this sweater much better in the red. i love this item!

This is the perfect blazer for a business conference in the summer. It keeps me warm in a cold conference room, but is lightweight and not bulky. It rolls up into my bag when I’m not needing it and doesn’t wrinkle. I love the fit and comfort!
This dress runs waaaay small. i would have too size up at least 2 sizes. while it is a beautiful color, it is an extremely stiff dress. returning!
I am little bit disappointed. I did not like the top. The only one thing I like is it is cotton.
I like the appearance and initial fit. I hope it retains all of this once washed. The material is quite light, and should be cool in warm weather. The colors and color contrast are great
Live in a hot climate and these dresses are great for work, very thin material though. Size is a little bigger than I would like but they didn't have extra small size.

The pants were true to size in the waist but they were a touch long for my 5'5" 120 lbs frame (i got a size 0). they did stretch out a little during the day (i wore them about 10 hours), but not nearly as much as the other reviews led me to believe. however, they were a little loose on my legs when i first put them on, which i liked.
Fits well in all but the length. Doesn't even reach the waist on me, which makes things feel a bit drafty in the cold winds. The parts it does cover are nice and warm at least.

This looked fabulous on the model, of course, and i love sweater dresses. but even in an xs, i was drowning in fabric and looked ludicrous. concept is good but execution went terribly wrong somewhere. a definite return.

I bought this online in the grey and blue and had high hopes. it runs big so size down at least 1-2 sizes. i didn't realize that the sweater looking part on the forearms was part of the coat. that part of the coat is really nice and comfy. unfortunately, the rest of the coat (the wool part) is very itchy. it would've been awesome if it was lined on the inside, but it's not...so i'm taking them back.

This skirt is gorgeous!! drapes beautifully & the color is vibrant! get it!! you'll be so pleased! i sure am!!!
I liked the arms and the polka dots.

This is a very well constructed sweater. It's weight is heavier then most but not to heavy. I bought a size larger then I am, not knowing what to expect & thought I could "shrink" it in the wash if it was to big. I should have purchased my size & not sized up. It does "shrink" abit in the wash, but then stretches right back out its original size.I purchased the dark gray & the color is spot on to the photos. However I am having issues with the color rubbing off onto my undergarments & white t-shirt that I have worn underneath it.All in all. I would buy this sweater again. I really like the boxy high in front, low in back cut.

I want to like this sweater. the color is lovely, more of a grayish blue, and the design is nice. the quality is amazingly good, as it's thick without being too thick and very soft. but the design is odd and quite unflattering! i got the xsmall but it's two big. the sleeves have a very low shoulder so they almost have a wing like look. it doesn't look like it does on this model. the waist area is a lot bigger, so it does sit on your hips, however the sweater isn't slimming cause of the odd shape

This is the second pair of these pair of pants I purchased here, as I loved the first pair.  So you can imagine my frustration when the waist on this pair is freaking huge.  I bought the EXACT same pair and same size, how can one pair fit marvelously and the other have a waist thats like 4 inches bigger.  Whatever sweatshop is making these need to take a refresher course on how to use a tape measure.  Thanks for the waste of money.
Pros: oversized pocket t shirt style. Longer length shorts  for us momma's needing to modest but cute. Great fabric. Washed wellcon: waistband is tight.

The shirt fit great but I’m lucky they come as a two pack… I’ve washed this one twice (normal washing no bleach) and it’s coming apart at the shoulder seam already… poor workmanship!

This suit is a great option if you don’t have a fitted/tailored suit. I’m 5’9”, 220 lbs. The pants were maybe a bit too long, but I didn’t need to have them hemmed, the waist was good (the elastic helped!), and the jacket was a great fit. The only minor complaint is the vest was a little snug. All things considered it was a great option for a formal event, that didn’t cost me hundreds of dollars.
This product runs either really small or is super high waisted. either way not for me.

I bought this top on sale - very glad i did not pay full price for it! i wash everything before i wear it. when it dried i saw that there was a grease spot on the back and a small hole on one upper arm - i will probably be able to take care of the grease spot, but the hole will be a little trickier, as the material is kind of filmy.

My husband wears a solid Medium in shirts. This shirt is a bit big on him. I have bought fishing shirts for him before and they were not as big as this one. I machine washed and dried it. Didnt change the size. No shrinkage. It wont wrinkle unless you let it just sit in the dryer. Hang once the cycle ends.
Love this so much, would have given it a five star review if it didn’t have a couple snags in it! I still love it

This blouse is perfect. I purchased the light gray to wear to a funeral. I wore a camisole under it. The material is soft. The blouse is classy. I plan to purchase other colors.

I purchased this in store and the red motif is short sleeved as pictured. the pattern is fun, vibrant and great for summer months. it's a more substantial weight fabric, not sheer or clingy. the fit is tts and it is a slightly longer length which i loved.

Got this today and am really pleased. beautiful detail and i love how the cowl neck hangs. it's not itchy at all. overall, a great find for the colder months ahead. i got a small and probably should have ordered xs  instead. runs a little big on my petite frame.

Beware! there is a reason this sweater is on sale. it is not even remotely the same color as pictured. instead of the lovely antique blue in the photo, this sweater is a faded, boring, teal-green. what a huge disappointment.

I was excited to see this top in person, but once i got a close up look at it (and also tried it on) i was disappointed. first, the color is much more persimmon orangey in person and that's a hard color to pull off for a lot of people. it just pulls any pink or red in your skin and highlights it. 

second, the top was poorly finished. i had to pick up two to try on because the lace was wonky across the front of the first one i grabbed. so much so that the lace was puckered because it had been

I like this blouse. I am 5’4 1/2, 140 lbs., 36 B bosom. I ordered Size  Medium in the flowered rose color and the color and print are very pretty. It is fully lined, no undershirt needed, and it is “flowly”  and very comfortable BUT, it fits very loose on the body.  It is the correct size for me  because the shoulder and chest area fits my body well, doesn’t slip down, does not show too much cleavage nor do the sleeves slip off my shoulders.  A size small would be too tight and uncomfortable around by shoulders. To make this blouse look good on me, I have to front tuck it into my pants . It looks good with jeans, casual and dressy pants.
It's way more distressed than it looks in the picture and that was a no for me.

This is our uniform shirt for summer in Florida.  Our company replaces auto glass for collision repair companies and our technicians wear these shirts in the summer.  They are tidy and cool since they never know if they will be working in full sun or shade - but it's always cooler with these shirts.  Sometimes the shops they work in are 100+ degrees heat index and these shirts are professional for that environment.  I would not recommend these shirts underneath other layers though.  That would trap the moisture against their bodies.These shirts are inexpensive enough that we can replace them if they get stained too much.  I would not recommend these for anyone who does welding since they are synthetic and any splatter may melt the material.
Excelente calidad y comodidad. Recomendado
They were too large in the waist for me. As far as the legs and hips they did fit.  This product doesn't form to your figure well at all.

I ordered size XXL which is my usual size, but I do wonder if XL would fit. Pants are very loose-fit and not super soft/plush but they are fine. I actually like the shirt more, which is snug-fitted and soft. It is often difficult for me to find sleeves long enough (5'9") but these were a great length. Overall, I'm keeping them but probably will keep looking for my "goldilocks" winter PJs.
Well made and comfortable. I hope they hold up for a long time because I really like them.

Probably should have noticed the material this jumpsuit is made of before buying. tencel, thus little to no give,kind of like linen and silk. beautiful material, soft with a slight sheen. the top portion fits well and the triangles cover the girls well (36dd). unfortunately there is no give on the back end for my bottom which is quite round and its tight around my thighs which aren't small either. (l/xl and 14). and sadly an xl would be too big upstairs and baggy around the middle. sigh, oh well

Although the design and quality were great, this did not work for me. it was boxy, square and overwhelmed my petite frame. if you are taller, or have a longer torso, this may be a great basic staple for your wardrobe.

I have bought 3 pairs of these pants and have the back pockets tear and the stitching come loose and fray. I don't do anything with the back pockets except keep my cellphone in them when walking. The pants are comfortable but 2 began to have these problems by day 45, and 1 within 30 days.

I went with my usual size, but it is too tight, it fits, but i would feel uncomfortable in it. i ordered the pink one, which looks nice in the picture, but in person, it looks cheap. the beading at the neckline immediately looked to me like cocktail dresses my grandma used to wear in the 1970s. that beaded neckline added to the cheap look. this one is not for me.

These pajamas are lightweight and perfect for summer.

Pants have an odd smell.  Had hoped it would wash out, but so far that is not the case after 6 or 7 washings.  It’s noticeable (at least to me) when wearing them.  Everything else is good, but can’t give more than 1 star if I don’t want to wear them.

I bought this top when i was 6 months pregnant and wore it the rest of the pregnancy. i am 5'4, 34d and 135 lbs. i got all the way up to 172lbs and a chest size of 36dd. now that i'm not pregnant...i don't think it flatters my "new figure" anymore. ha! but i seriously wore it all the time when i was pregnant...so gotta give it at least 4 stars.
The comfort is great just expected a different color.

I love the green pattern. the fabric hangs and moves beautifully. thick enough to cover undergarments without slip or liner. ballet back is nice detail. i'm curvy and generally between s and m, s has a little room to spare. generally flattering piece. great for summer!

The pant color, size and style was good however was 4-5 inches too long.  Returned.

Ordered online, and when it came i was very excited to open it - but the photo doesn't show how incredibly wide the cut is. it is also quite cropped and looked very awkward on me - 5'9, 130. the embroidery is lovely, but the style doesn't work. i had a small, but the area in the shoulders was cut very tight and it would not have worked well if i wanted to raise or lower my arms above shoulder height. might work better on someone with a more petite frame, but i do caution how "voluminous" the cut

worth the money!

Will be giving to my grandsons who are tall and slim.  If you're looking for a loose-fitting tank, or wife beater, this is not the tank for you.  If you are a tall and very slim man, it will be a perfect fit.  Not for those of us with an hour glass figure.

The jacket is super cute on but the material is super synthetic. The only way I can describe it is it feels like the same thing used on a cheap wig. It’s not soft at all and definitely not anything close to Sherpa. I kept it because it is so cute on but I don’t wear it often because it feels so cheap.

I used to only wear Levi’s when I was in my 20’s. Then I had a baby and I’m not sure if they made the high rise jeans yet but I stopped buying them. Now I’m 44 and I’m a Levi girl again! High rise all the way only because I get a muffin waist with anything else. These eliminated that for me completely. No more tight belts or having to constantly pull the waist of my jeans up. These are red tab Levi’s so the jean material is sturdier than the lesser priced one, which I tried before. Usually my jeans eventually rip in the upper inner thigh/crotch area. But not these!! I have several pairs and even my oldest pair is still going strong. They have a stretch to them that is a miracle for me. I work 12 hour shifts and always wear Levi’s. They are extremly comfortable.I live in Arizona so during the summer I wear the ones that have at least one rip in the legs which is like air conditioning for my legs. It is nice to grab a pair of jeans from my closet and always be putting on my favorite go-to jeans. I wash them inside out (unless I got something on them) and dry on medium and remove them from dryer before they are super hot.I wonder if I can buy stock in these because I believe these are the best jeans out there. I haven’t tried expensive jeans but expensive jeans start off with that negative of costing so much so I just don’t go there, it just doesn’t seem worth it to me. Even the highest priced Levi’s are a great buy. They have been doing jeans for a long time and they know how to make us look good.Keep in mind there are different #s for different fits so what ever you prefer for your body size and shape they will have something for you to love too!
40% sweaters...i couldn't pass it up. unfortunately, when i raise my arms, my tummy shows (i'm 5'6"), so i had to return it.

Don't need "foofy" designer jeans.  They're jeans, and you shouldn't have to take out a second mortgage to buy them.  These look great and fit well, at an affordable price. Can't ask for more than that.

This one didn't work for me. there is no zipper, you climb into it from the very large neck hole. it was very low cut and the shoulders kept sliding off but the bottom half fit snug. the tie and waist seam didn't hit at my waist but the largest part of my middle. i tried other belts and it wasn't much better. the fabric and print were great. i love jumpers but this one went back.

I saw this dress worn on the street and thought it was lovely, the perfect work dress. i then found it in the store and my size was already sold out, so i visited another retailer, and another to find it. unfortunately the color blocking on the chest was not very flattering for me, it seemed to overly accentuate it. i am 5'9" a 36 dd size 12.
the colors, the fabric are all wonderful. but this dress is not for me.
Waist 30 is little bit short of real 30. I like every other aspect.

I purchased both the floral sleep shorts and the top. the floral watercolor pattern is gorgeous and the fabric is very soft. like the other reviewers, i appreciate the feminine quality of this set while also being able to run around the house. i am 135 lbs and purchased a s.
Fyi to help with sizing i am 5'7" weigh 134 lb and like things loose fitting but the medium was too big and sack like. dress is cute and the color is true to photo.

I ordered a size small...it's fits like a medium. So I am going to return the S size and get an XS size. Apricot is more like a tan or brown...I didn't complement my skin color and so I am getting it a different color. I am 5'3 120 lbs.

So wrinkled that to wear out in public you would have to iron them. I’m not willing to do that with a polyester blend fabric.

I'd previously ordered a medium in Navy (May 2021) and the fit was what I'd call "relaxed." I kept them because, though I like long pants more fitted, a pair of loose shorts is perfect for lounging around the house, gardening, or exercise (a kind of "full" fit that allows completely unrestricted movement).  Back then, I used the Amazon recommendation to determine my size selection. (It was based on purchases of size 4 32" inseam Wrangler jeans and Baleaf highwaisted size S 32" length yoga pants and Prana size 2 reg Halle hiking pants among other orders.) In other words, I bought what I "knew" was one size too big, because I wanted exactly that "full" fit. (My stats are: 5'8", 130 lbs, waist 26", hips 36.5".)This most recent pair is Light Steel. Right out of the package, the fit on them is beyond loose. I am hoping they'll shrink, because they are NOT at all flattering -- too long (touching my kneecaps!) and tent-like in the waist and hips. I'd swear they didn't have a size chart when I ordered my Navy pair and a look at the current chart would suggest a size XS. Besides after laundering the Navy ones, they were the right amount of loose for me.Here's the current (Aug 2022) chart:US WOMEN'S SHORTS SIZE CHARTSize  Waist  HipXS  27 - 28  35.5 - 36.5S 28.5 - 29.5 37.5 - 38.5M 30.5 - 31.5 39.5 - 40.5L 33 - 34.5 42 - 43.5XL 36.5 - 39 45.5 - 47.5XXL 41 - 43.5 49.5 - 51.53XL 45.5 - 48 53.5 - 55.5I also have a Black pair (size M) ordered, but they're not due to arrive for another 5 days. My history with Hanes is that there can be HUGE differences in fit and fabric content between colors, so I will give the Black ones a chance. I will definite keep the better (out-of-the-box) fitting of the two and may or may not return the reject.

Maybe if i sized down to a small i'd like them better.. they look ok from the front. but it seems like the leg was cut way too wide. there is exceess material in the back and leg hole. they are not all flattering to my rear end. overall kind of shapeless and the fabric is prone too wrinkling. too expensive (with the added shipping fee for an online exclusive) for the lack of structure and simplicity.

They fit hair right, not too tight. I bought these Jan 1st. Only lasted 5 months. I got 2 of them. One already ripped. You can see the material rubbing off the crotch area. Otherwise, stick to a tried and true Port Authority polo if you're looking for a work shirt with a familiar fit. AmazonBasics totally missed the mark with this shirt.

I wanted to like these pants.  The fabric is good and they seem well-constructed.  The pockets are shallower than I'd like, which is unfortunate, but the deal killer for me is that the crotch is cut way too high.  You have to be careful putting them on to avoid injuring yourself, since the split between the pantlegs happens much sooner than one would expect.  Once they're on, the lack of room in the crotch means that the seam in the back continually tries to insert itself between my cheeks.  I don't want to show rear cleavage at work, so I'm passing these on.  (I'll note that I even ordered a larger waist size than usual.)

The product is not good.

Within 2 washings the color faded to a not so black black, like a pair of pants that has been washed over a year's use. after 5 or so washes the hook and eye closure began to fall off. the pants fit well, albeit a bit short (i'm 5'9") and they run small. i sized up to a 6, when i usually am between a 2 or 4. i let the hem out, sewed the hook and eye closure back on and redyed them, and now they are good to go, but for nearly $90 i don't expect to have to do this much work. these are not my first

This top is too boxy and has too much going on. it should have no buttons or different ones.

I'm a vest lover of all shapes, lengths and styles so i had big plans for this vest.  in the end, the pockets ended up ruining the lay and line of this vest.  they are too bulky and end up pulling at the front of the vest, drawing your eye to the pockets and not the neckline.  i agree with previous reviews that it could be worn into spring- i wouldn't wear it in summer.  the fit is loose, i thought the medium arm holes were large for my frame- 5'8" 140#.  overall i sent it back.

I bought one shirt for work (uniform required blue polo) and it was great so I bought two more.  The second two, while they look the same, come out of the dryer full of wrinkles and won't steam flat - I have to iron them and have never had to iron a polo shirt beforeIn addition, anything that creases them, like a seatbelt, leaves a mark that lasts until I wash and iron them again.I don't know why they changed the material but these two shirts I bought most recently are just horrible.

Product is made for 50-60 degree weather not ski or northern conditions of 0 or minus 10 degree temperatures. A real ski coat would have a very heavy lining and would feel heavy when you pick the coat up. You would sweat if you wore it inside your house.  This is a light coat with minimal lining.  I have a ski coat I have stood outside waiting for a bus at minus ten temperatures for a half an hour  and didn’t feel cold that’s how well a real ski coat feels. That’s why people buy ski coats. This is not a ski coat.
Good stretch and motion from the fabric.  Reasonably well made not rugged but suitable for office or home.I appreciated the 35W size offering and selection of colors.

I love these pants! first, they are super flattering. for a new mom, the waist comes up high and tucks everything in without rolling over. second, they are versatile. you can pair them with pointed flats, boots or casual with sneakers. i am wearing mine with cream flats and the cream moth boucle colorblocked pullover sweater. also - normally i am an xl (especially for length!) but the large fit perfectly. i didn't want to say that they ran large, because they aren't too loose.

I'm joking around! This did look very 80s on me I think because it was too big. The shoulders looked very large, like Milli Vanilli large on me so I had to return it. It's a pretty design, but it did me absolutely no favors. The fabric was nice and I think the cut would be nice on thinner, less busty women especially. Normally I order 2X in cardigans and blazers because then they can go over anything I decide to wear underneath and not be constricting (I am an XL usually) but that was not a good call with this purchase. I suggest going with your normal size when ordering this.

I really want to love this shirt, but the small is just way too big on me. for reference, i'm a 32d (which is why i didn't want to size down much more than a small), 5'6' and 125 and i'm drowning in this. i'm going to try it with different bottoms and ultimately will keep it because i do love the quality. just size down a couple of sizes!!

I have bought this jacket before. I really like it and got it again in a different color. However I’m very upset with Amazon and their recent choices of packaging their products. This material is wonderfully thick and is a high grade quality. With that being said. I have to see if I need to take it to the cleaners to get these wrinkles out!!!! . The package came in a single layer of packaging like the original packaging for the jacket. Not an outside covering just in case that packaging would’ve gotten damaged. The jacket was literally balled up in the bag. It’s not like the bag was a large bag and my jacket was neatly folded!! No!!  it was a small bag which exaggerated the wrinkles even more.!!This isn’t the only time a garment I have purchased has arrived like this! I did not say anything about the other purchases but now I’m getting real irritated!!AMAZON!!! If you cannot give us merchandise that is properly packaged. Please stop promising same day or two day delivery!!!

I can't think of many things more comfortable than cloth & stone's fabric, so when i saw this jumpsuit i had to try it. it is a nice mid-weight perfect for fall weather or a mild winter like we are currently having in the northeast! looks very cute with a duster cardigan over it. fits true to size (meant to fit a little loosely). length is great everywhere on my 5'7" frame. feels like wearing pajamas, with the benefit of looking put-together!

This is a flattering skirt for work or play. a few things to be aware of: 
- it is a lightweight knit without a lining (would travel great and never need ironing)
- the waist is quite high 
- the waist is quite slim (people with tummy self-consciousness might feel funny in it)
- the hang is flattering for people with butts and hips (such as myself)
- true to size for me

I love this sweater and the sleeves are amazing. i also love the purple color, which is more of a deep maroon. the material seems to be of good quality. what i don't love about this sweater is the shape. it is very swingy, which is somewhat flattering because it isn't too clingy, but it poofs out a bit too much on the sides, becoming unflattering from certain angles.

I did a significant amount of research/reading reviews on Amazon, as well as the on the Levi site to make sure I chose the correct size. I'm 5'11", 185lbs with an athletic build and it seemed like the large would be the correct size for me. The overall length and arm length are both what they should be, but the body of the jacket is ridiculously baggy. I mean hilariously baggy. I could almost fit two of my torso in the jacket and still button it comfortably. If this is built for heavy-set people, they should note that in the description. It's insanely baggy with no form of any kind. It's a parachute with sleeves. If I jumped out of an airplane in this thing, I could probably glide to safety like one of those flying squirrels. I tried washing it to shrink it a bit, but all that did was significantly fade the color, and one of the sleeve buttons fell off. Maybe a size small would have fit my torso better, but then the overall length and arm length would be way too short. Super lame.

Cute dress to throw on and go. fits pretty true to size except for the slip underneath. it's a little tight and i felt to short for the dress. i ended up wearing a full slip i had under it and that work great!

I bought a number of these sweaters and am quite fond of them.  They are warm enough for temperate weather, but not too warm, comfortable, soft, and loose enough not to be restrictive but not so loose as to become a baggy nuisance.  If you are looking for a casual sweater to wear over a t-shirt, I highly recommend them.  (If you have fabric sensitivities, give one a try.  I found them quite comfortable.  I did not notice them against my skin as much as I do poly blends, and I found them to breathe well and to not make me uncomfortably sweaty the way poly blends do.)The one shortcoming they may have is that they do not do all that well in the dryer.  To get around this, I let them lie flat until they are nearly dry and then just run them in the dryer for 15-20 minutes at low heat to get the last of the moisture out of them.  If you won't mind babying your cardigans in this way, then I'd recommend getting a few of these.

For warmth they are very light weight for a New England winter. Would prefer them to be a little thicker. Very comfortable definitely for fall spring maybe for summer.
In person the colors are prettier and it's more interesting than the front shot in the model. i tried on and bought my regular medium. got home and tried it on and realized it's too big:(
The sweater I ordered came and was bubble gum pink- looked nothing like the picture! I immediately returned it.
I have 4 of these sweaters. They are super soft and easy to pull on. Sleeves are nice and long. Great, comfortable material.

I work in a school and really wanted to rock the cardigan look this year. I've purchased 3 of these in different colors and I am very satisfied with the quality for the cost. I'm 5'9" and weigh 170 lbs and like my clothes to be comfy, so the Large fits perfectly. Highly recommended.

Nice rendition of a summer halter that resembles denim. i bought my normal small but could have downsized to an xs. if your busty stay with your normal size as it is more tts. i like the blue plaid colors and the soft cotton material it's made of. it has a very nice flow with the cute peek a boo back neckline. the interior fabric lining is also a quite lovely chambray blue that nicely offsets the blue plaid.
A large was so skimpy! Not a good fit but it did have beautiful sleeves 😢
Tried a pair for myself and loved them so I got these as a gift for my mom.  She loves them, as well.  Very soft and comfortable to wear.
I love this jacket. It’s very comfortable and nice.
Material very thing and does not stretch.  Very deceptive to call this athletic wear.

This skirt looked absolutely beautiful in store and took my breath away. i immediately headed to the fitting room to try it on, but was disappointed by the awkward ruching. if this skirt has removed that upper portion and kept a normal waistband (thereby also shortening it to knee length), it would have been lovely. it should be noted that this is midi-length, which is awkward on me. i was unable to find a cute way to wear this which is disappointing since it could have been lovely.
I liked the good fit.

This is a really pretty summery dress - especially for the price! Material is lightweight, breathable, and soft but not sheer or see-through.The pockets are cut well so it’s still flattering on the hips and neckline is a nice level if you do not want to show cleavage (even for larger chests!) straps are thick enough to cover bra straps.I loved it so much I bought another color!

I'm 5 ' 5" and 132 lbs., 34d and the size m is perfect. i will probably wear a thin, long cami under it as it is slightly see through. it doesn't gape under the arms like some sleeveless items...it fits smoothly. as the other review mentioned, it would be a perfect swim suit cover up. but i'm going to wear it more as a casual, very versatile, perfect for a hot day summer dress!

I wanted to love this dress. the colors are heavenly and it looks light and airy. it isn't, it is very heavy, much too heavy for florida heat. the top layer is a beautiful sand color and while the fabric is nice, the heaviness of the top really weighs the whole dress down. i felt like it added ten pounds to my appearance, easily. back it went, boo hoo. if you are between sizes, i would size down, runs a bit big.
I ORDERED A LARGE IM A 5’4, 95 POUNDS, 16 YEARS OLD AND ITS SUCH A CUTE OVERSIZED HOODIE

I was so excited for this coat when i saw it in the catalog, but disappointed when it got to stores. the faux fur pictured both here and in the catalog looked much more of a burnt red brown color than the straight up maroon that it actually is in store. i'd say it even looks a bit purple. the nice thing is that it is detachable and you can replace it with something else if you really don't like the color. i have decided to buy it anyways because the fit of the coat is lovely and simply stunning.

I typically wear a small or x-small in most brands from retailer, but decided to order a small and medium in this dress since it's a non-stretchy fabric. i'm glad i did because the medium was a good fit and the small would have been very snug. so i would agree with the previous reviewer and say that this dress runs at least a size small. otherwise i really like the fit the fabric.

I will be returning this vest. Way too heavy for the summer, lined very heavy and no stretch. The only part that stretches are the arm holes. Don’t care for the style of it. I don’t believe it’s flattering at all.I am 5’3”and about 145 pounds. I like my vests  to fit tight. I am pretty busty, 38C. This fit me fine I would order a medium again but not this one!

My favorite of the season. i purchased the grey sweater while shopping with girlfriends. i love it so much i'll be purchasing the brown as well. i would normally wear a m/l but tried it on and purchased a s. i don't like very fitted items. however, a small fit perfectly on me. this item runs big.

The proportions on this are a little off but fortunately they worked fine for my husband. It actually looks a little dressier than his fleece quarter zips (which we stock up on every winter) so it's nicer for a casual dinner. The price is nice but it is a gamble on whether the proportions will work for you, especially on the sleeves and width.
The material feels nice and i love the flared arms.
I loved this blouse, it  was flattering fit well and its a very light material , so that you could wear it on hot summer days
I have no complaints. I loved this outfit. I got compliments on the outfit
This is my new favorite top! looks and fits as described.

On our trip to Ireland,  my husband needed a light weight rain jacket. This jacket packed easy and looked great on him.
Disappointed in fit. Runs smaller than true size 2x.

Ag jeans have been a main stay for me. they are the most comfortable and best looking jeans on my body. however this pair was too tight and shorter then i liked. the fabric and color is beautiful. i wear the same size for ag no matter the design. but this one ran too small. i have to return it. i will try the next size up if they still have them.

Beautiful dress. loved the navy and the low v neck in front and back. but i had to return for smaller size. i am 5'2" 114 lbs. i ordered small and it was a little big and definitely long. i returned for an xs petite and am hoping it will fit perfectly!

I love that these are a nice thin stretchy material (not in a bad or cheap way) because they are perfect for the warm weather as well. i got the color grey in a size 29. i usually wear a 29 in stevie's so they were tts. maybe a bit tight in the beginning but they do stretch a little with wear. i did try on the size 30 but they were a little big around the waist. for reference i am 5'6", 145lbs, size 6/m. the fit of stevies are perfect and hugs in all the right places. i have wider calves and it

I thought that it looked like it belonged on a 15 year-old. i can almost see why they styled the model in what looks like ankle socks....ready for cheerleading. for reference it fits true to size, but is very short. i am 5'2" and tried on a regular small - it was at least 5 inches above my knee.

The fabric is terrible and for what I thought was a fashionable oversized shirt it was anything but!. Don’t waste your money!

These pants fit tts and are ask pictured in length on me (5'5"). i can go between a 4 and a 6, and tried the 6 and they were fine. that said, the fabric completed turned me off. it is that sort of stretch fabric with a sheen to it. i did not find them to be the wonderful wardrobe basic i thought they'd be- the fabric is just too stiff, and the sheen made them feel cheap, unfortunately.

The colors in this dress are much less vibrant in person. the scoop of the neckline is very wide and deep. i know others have posted that this is a great dress for work, but not in my workplace.

A bit of a disappointment there, but not a deal breaker.
