Ugh! i am not sure how anyone is giving this good reviews. i tried small, medium and large on and huge huge huge, boxy, fabric bunched at the shoulders and did i mention it's way too boxy? the fabric and pattern are so pretty but the fit is just awful. i would try this one on before purchasing.

I ordered these hoping to find some nice cheap golf pants. These are more like dress pants, hence the classic-fit. If you’re looking for golf pants that are a little tighter around the calves and ankles, go with the slim fit. I got a pair of those as well and they are right on the money.

This top is so cute and i immediately had to purchase it when i saw it. i am usually drawn to boxy, cropped shirts, but i find this is harder to wear than i anticipated. it may be because i got a small size, but it is boxier than i anticipated and is almost hard to wear with even jeans. i recommend you buy because the detailing is so pretty and perfect, but try on and make sure you have some good bottoms to pair it with!

These tops are so flattering - really nicely made and a great weight. They were true to size for me according to the bust measurement in the size chart. I have several similar sleeveless tops for work, but want to replace them with these. My only compliant is that they are really long, even when tucked or partially tucked. They have kind of a split hem (you can see in the very last seconds of the video in the listing), and if it ended right at the point where it splits, it would be the perfect length for me to wear untucked, so I am planning to take them to a tailor and see what they can do, because I really like them otherwise.
I bought various colors and they all fit differently. Poorly made and looks cheap.

I bought this top in the store where i found they had a beautiful mint color not shown here. i think the length is perfect. so many of the tees, etc. are extra long, so it's nice to have a variety to chose from. i'm 5'5" and this little tee hits right where my legs begin. it is very free flowing and cool. i own several similar tees and tanks from this line and they are great when the weather gets hot.

I returned this item - The waist and thighs fit really well but there was a super odd bunching in the crotch area like there was too much fabric. They were pretty unflattering.

It fits perfectly. I am 5’3 and was looking for a blazer more on the oversized look and it was perfect. Not too baggy not too big either. It is longer than other from Amazon

Fabric is very thin and the neck looked a bit stretched out. Very disappointed.
Lightweight and comfortable.

I really wanted to like this dress and was encouraged by the positive reviews. the dress itself was very comfortable but was very unflattering. the top fabric hit my ribs funny and made me look really wide.
This was completely different than i expected. the xs/s was so large that it looked messy. unfortunately i had to return it.

I ordered the same size and fit jeans in 2 different colors. The dark blue pair fit true to size (like all my other Levi’s). However, the light pair is several sizes smaller despite all tags stating 32 (please see picture for reference). The light pair is clearly a factory defect.

The material of the cloth is super good, it can definitely be used when working out. The fit is quite comfortable too, for me it was as expected and I like to wear it around the house too. I gave a bit less rating because I ordered Set D which includes 4 tshirts as mentioned but received only 3 of them for some reason.

Bought this in an xs and i liked the style of the skirt. it was long enough to wear to work. 
however the waist was too large and would not stay up on my waist. returned.

I waited a long time to get this top. unfortunately i will be returning. the sides are gathered and stick out a lot on the sides. not as pictured. the sides should have been pleated. it runs smaller in the bust and when closed it was a little snug. afraid this might shrink with dry cleaning or washing. the design is unique and wish this top would of worked.
Perfect for coaches or athletes

This jacket was too wide and the length in the arms too short. i wear a medium in almost any article of clothing and felt like i was swimming in a short little jacket. the ratio of how wide it is to the length is not for me but might work well with other body types. the arms were definitely too short.
These shirts are comfortable and good looking.  However they were wrinkled and had to be ironed before they could be worn.  A little bit longer than expected so will have to wear it tucked in.

I adore this top - so cute, flattering, and easy to dress up or down. yes, it is a little better suited for larger chests, but i personally don't mind a discreet pin for this beauty. i'm a 34a and slim build, and the only issue is when i bend forward - it falls beautifully otherwise. great with everything from a black pencil skirt to jeans and a black leather jacket...cute with denim jacket and white pants too. easy wardrobe piece.

I do agree with others that the draping does sit a little funny, but its nothing that a simple tack can't fix. this suit looks incredible on, and does a good job of hiding my "mom pooch" while still making me feel sexy with the cutouts. also covers the chest area well.

I have so many compliments on this blouse. i love the style and design. i wear it with my long cotton skirt because it runs a little short since i have a long torso and i am 5"8 tall. i would love to wear it with my skinny pants but then it won't look right in the back kinda hang out. otherwise really nice quality blouse. i would definitely buy another just to have a back up.

I purchased this coat in Dec 2020, and returned it due to the zipper getting stuck.  Amazon exchanged the coat and sent a new one.  Less than a year later the replacement coats zipper jammed with the coat all the way zipped up.  Never again Columbia!

Beautiful white top. peplum never looged good on me until i found this one. i am 5.4, 34 dd and this peplum looked good on me. most white tops are see through int he front and this one isn't. but back is a little see through. for casual that much see though is good. not sure for office. but this is still a keeper for me :)

If you are going for a ridiculously high priced ugly sweater contest, this is the one for you. i normally like clothing with some character and juxtaposition, but this one did not do it for me. i cannot imagine the collar fitting right or flattering anyone, and the mixed layers end up making it look cheap rather than trendy.

This dress seems quite high quality and is wonderfully designed, except in the chest. the wrap style hugs in all the right places but the chest. i'm slightly large chested (34c/d) but can usually wear a size small or size 4 in dresses and tops (5'5", 122 lbs). the small in this dress was great everywhere else, but i couldn't breathe and it totally flattened out my chest. also, it is quite low cut, so another mark against it for anyone with a semi-large bust. couldn't wear it to work that reason

I'm happy with this sweater! a few things that may help others: 1) the detail on the yoke is made from a silky taupe-colored fiber, 2) it is ivory, not white and 3) although the fit is true to size, the sweater runs short, so if you prefer a longer fit you may want to size up.

I really wanted to love the shorts.  when i read that the shorts were lined, i expected them to be lined so that my underwear didn't show.  even though the shorts are lined, you can see through the fabric completely.  this was absolutely disappointing since the shorts have a lovely exterior design; pockets; and, comfortable waistline.  i'm returning the shorts as well.

Disappointed in the quality of the dress. love the style and especially the colors. the fabric of the body of the dress is very very thin and just poorly made. the top bodice is more substantial. not worth the price tag of $148.00. dress does run short.

He says he likes that it keeps him warm during our coldest days. It's one of his favorite zip ups so I bought him another one in black. The quality is great and is still as soft as when i bought it.

I love this sweater, so why a lower rating? while i love the material and the color, it lost all of its shape before i even left the house! i am a size 6 / small and it looked clownish on me before i ever got to my dinner party.  i plan to wash it this evening and i really hope that this brings it back to its original shape and keeps it.
I love this poncho. it' so soft and cozy!! looks great with a pair of tights or jeans. just adorable.

Bought the aqua because sizes were sold out. the bright color will be a welcome change this winter among all my neutrals. it's lovely, soft, well-fitting, and i only hope we have a few days in the south so i can wear it. well worth the price. would be a lovely wardrobe addition for any age, changed by what it's worn with...shoes, accessories,

So, I use this suit as a costume and it barely gets the job done. I’ve worn many three-piece white suits in my career as a professional Bee Gee Impersonator. Despite these pictures making the suit look pretty nice… It was way way too big for me. I ordered a size small and I definitely should’ve ordered an extra small. I was on the low end of the measurements for the small size but the discrepancy is huge. In these pictures I have completely rebuilt the entire suit with safety pins in order for it to fit like this, I took in almost 3 inches from the vest, 2 inches from the jacket and about 4 inches from the pants. Considering that this suit is coming from an Asian country I assumed it would be a smaller fit but still followed the size chart. It is quite the opposite. It is an incredibly “American” fit. It was a huge inconvenience because it took two weeks for shipping and I had a show to do. I did not have time to send the suit back and wait to get the correct size.Now I’ve worn it and put safety pins in it so I don’t think I can return it… So I’m stuck with this giant suit. If you’re using it for a costume it’s pretty OK quality. The material is a bit sheer but as you can see in the photos, it photographs well. The material and build is not great but it’s also not as bad as some other three-piece suits I’ve purchased from eBay in a similar price range. I almost gave it 2 stars but these pictures let me know it didn’t look as bad as I thought.

The material is nice and has a lot of stretch. i ordered the small as i'm a 6 in most dresses. it fits comfortably  i could probably get away with xs but have a large chest so was afraid it wouldn't cover me. i'm 5'2" so a petite might be a bit better but it was sold out. i'll have to wear tall wedges with this one.

I am 5'6", 130 lbs with an athletic body type and i ordered a size small. these were really baggy in the thigh/quadricep area and made my thighs look bulky. the fabric quality is very nice and i like the idea of them for curvier body types. my son commented that they looked like pajama pants and i agreed.
Nice color. Fabric was soft. The problem was the length. I purposely ordered a size up so I would get extra length. This was not the case. Barely reached my waist. Returned it. :(

Excellent product. Perfect fit

I love this skirt, the colors and the softness. i am little disappointed though that the skirt shrunk quite significantly in a cold water hand wash after the second time of wearing. i don't know if it is the material but i followed the instructions for washing. i am going to keep the skirt because i love it so much and hope that it might stretch a little out with wear and go back to its normal size. despite the shrinkage, i highly recommend.

This looked so odd on me! i decided to give it to someone with a different body type and she found it really odd too. the sleeve are a bit too long to be short and they are tight at the bottom. the top is really large, as to be unflattering. perhaps it's just that it doesn't work on someone who is petite, but this one is a return.

Runs very big.  i ordered a l and need a m.  unfortunately no medium left!  great top with lots of character. hate i missed this cute top

Received 19 November. Worn on 27 November 2020SHOCKED! I expect a global brand like Nautica to give value for money for a  $50 Pyjama set. Extremely poor finish. I have attached photos.1. The stitching was not aligned, I have a bump in my pyjama shirt front bottom on the outside as the stitching jammed and puckered the cloth outside for more than 4 inches.2. The whole shirt has loose threads hanging out where the cloth ends.3. The inside part has been cut by some grade 2 kid - I have enclosed photo of the hem line where the cloth is showing zig zg lines of uneven cut.4. last photo shows long threads inside the sleev - i felt like some slimy worms had crept inside my shoulder...And i must say the buttons used are small shirt buttons instead of the usual bigger buttons on Pyjama shirts. The drawstring in the pyjama bottom is synthetic which slips and opens the knot - my pajamas almost dropped in front of my 20 year old sister in law.Since I had the order shipped to me overseas it cost me additional $58.52 for shipping and import duties ie almost $99 for a Nautica sleepwear. I bought it for the Nautica brand and there is no chance I can return it as it will cost me a lot tfor return shipping and loss of import duties.Buy your PJs at a $10 discount store. Very very disappointed!

These shorts are comfortable and seem like they fit good when you initially try them on, but by the time you start walking around, they become very loose. I've had to size down twice, and thinking about going down to the next size.I initially ordered my normal size 9 but found myself pulling them up most of the day. I ordered a size 7 and though they seemed slightly tighter, was still uncomfortably loose within an hour or so of wearing them.I recently received the size 5 that I ordered but they were noticeably loose, pulling on without even having to unbutton them. This prompted me to compare the sizes.As you can tell in the pictures, the size 7 is much smaller than the size 5. I even borrowed my friend's size 5 to compare a washed and new pair. I thought, maybe they shrink after wash, but that doesn't seem like the case here.Side note: After speaking to my friend who owns the same shorts, she is experiencing the same issues with the sizes. She has sized down 3 times and considering trying the next size down. It almost seems impossible to get the right fit here. Something, possibly the stretch of the waist seem, is very off. I feel like I need those waist adjusters found in children's clothes here.So what you should know is that:1) these shorts are very stretchy2) you should definitely size down3) the color will fade just a bit after wash4) and just because you order a specific size, it's highly possible that they won't fit like that size should.Even though I've struggled in finding a good fit with these shorts, I'll still give them 4 stars because everything else about them is great. They are a good length, big pockets, and comfortable everywhere except the waist.
They are perfect.  I love the shorts with long sleeves...
I sent these back. Loved them but too small for me and I even sized up.

Definitely size up. My daughter is a true 7/8 in all brands but these will have to be sent back due to being very short and a little tight.

First, this is a really cute suit and I'm excited to put my kid in it for Easter. However, there were a few disappointments. First, the photo showed an image of a Navy jacket with khaki pants, light blue, shirt and pink tie. What was delivered was a navy jacket, grey pants, blue shirt, and navy/gold striped tie. Like I said, it's a cute outfit. It just wasn't what was described. Secondly, while the jacket seems quite nice, the pants seem very low quality. The material is super thin. Lastly the tag on the shirt is really irritating, and one of those stiff plastic feeling tags that even when you cut it out of the shirt, the remnants still remain.I'm giving this review three out of five stars because the product as a whole is still a good deal for the price. I just wish it came as described. Ultimately, I ended up buying an additional tie so my son and daughter would match colors. So maybe the price wasn't such a good deal after all.Anyway, if you're not picky... Go for it! If you want something specific, get it somewhere else.

I've worn Wrangler jeans for years and this pair I just received didn't disappoint for fit or style. However, what's up with the lines? Apparently, some colors have lines dyed into them. When I looked at the picture online I just thought they were creases in the jeans from wear; didn't pay much attention. But they are made and dyed to look as though they're old and creased or something, I'm not exactly sure. I've never owned jeans that naturally faded with lines across the front of them like that so I'm not sure what the look is that they're trying to achieve.But what the heck, these are supposed to be authentic and some of the colorways have lines and some don't. I just want regular old comfortable Wrangler jeans. I'll wear them out in my own way, thank you very much. It's too much trouble to return them so I'll live with the lines, but I'll be more careful next time I order jeans to make sure the manufacturers haven't dyed lines across them. This is as bad as the jeans that have holes in the knees. I used to patch them or cut them off when they developed holes in the knees but now people buy them that way and want them "pre-holed." What a world, what a world.

Loved them. Then I went to the grocery store and they wanted to fall to the floor. They stretched out so badly they were unwearable after 30 minutes.  I had to hold them up with one hand and checkout with the other.

These cords are so soft and snug on- like a hug for your lower half! i appreciate their lack of stretch: they don't seem to "bag out" like other cords can. i like that the fabric is soft but the shape is more stiff. the grey is slightly lighter/more silvery in real life than the picture depicts. for ref, i'm 5'2" and 103lbs and i bought the 24p.

I bought this in the blue and really wanted to like it--i had plans to check sizing and then order it again in the red, as well! however, this skirt falls victim to the recent design trend of using a pattern for a structured skirt but substituting a softer fabric and (horrors!) an elastic waistband. this ended up just looking kind of cheap and sweatshirty as a result. back it went.

This brand has odd fitting of late. i normally wear a m in retailer tops but i had to size up to 12 on this shirt as it was tight across my chest. i am a b cup and had a sports bra on when i tried it. brought it home and tried on with a regular, non pushup bra and it pulls slightly. i might return it because my guess is that it will shrink when washed. otherwise, its a cute tunic style top.
Great shorts, they fit well, they're a good length, and the waist isn't loose. Decent pockets. They do wrinkle and they are not at all stain resistant. These are my husband's favorite shorts.
If you want to look like you're wearing a garbage bag from Little House on the Prairie purchase this dress

I really wanted to like this dress on me, but it was not to be. the color is one of my favorites, but the dress accented all my problem areas. sadly, i returned it. i'm sure that someone with less substantial hips will look great in it.
Size is NOT true, order larger size!!!!
The cut of the bodice is very strange and unflattering. it is great quality, but designed poorly. returned it.
The shirt is made ok, but the fit is a bit small through the chest.

I tried this shirt in a small (my usual retailer size) and it was very unflattering.   the fabric was ultra soft and it seemed it was nicely made.  however, this shirt is so unstructured and oversized, i might as well worn a brown paper bag.
I ordered a 14 Short and although what was delivered was labeled as such, I believe it was actually a 14 average that was sent.  I will have to have them hemmed up.
Sized way too small

I ordered a small and it is enormous; i usually wear a size 10. it is short but the fullness in the body and the sleeves made me look like a sumo wrestler. also, it is a very heavy knit which would be great for up north but too bulky for atlanta unless the temps are in the 40s. i'm sending it back.
Gorgeous dress, but so low in front and in back...i couldn't figure out how to pull it off without a cardigan/sweater. beautiful fabric and color.

Medium size fits as I expected. The color does not appear to be a true white...slightly off-white, but not too far off. Love the comfort and fit so definitely keeping. I was worried that the elastic cuffs would be itchy or irritate my wrists, but they are just loose enough that it's not bothersome (my wrists are very small).
The colors on the tank were beautiful i didn't keep it because i have a few similar tops, but i liked it! fits true to size with an a line shape

I carefully read the reviews and decided to order a medium since that size works for me generally with floaty styles. the neck was a bit small but once over my head it fit and looked nice. the deal breaker for me is the huge droopy armholes that showed half my bra. the colors are deeper than shown. but the pattern and length overwhelmed my shape feeling a lot like a maternity top. i liked that the sides are shorter but overall it's just not my style. better suited i think for taller, slimmer bod
Love everything about this, except the sizing.  Fits like a small in middle, but w/sleeves totally off.  I am returning g and powdered tbe next size up—it is going back too.
I love the fit and flow of the dress. The zipper is really small and was hard to go over the inseam.

The stretch and style of these shorts is great, and I love the pockets!  But due to the fit and length of I make any movements the legs immediately roll up my thighs and the fabric all wads up in my crotch 😑 kinda suspected this might happen due to the more curvy/muscular shape of my thighs.  Probably would be great on thinner more lean legs!  Not sure if sizing up would fix this problem, the small size fits my waist perfectly.  I think it’s just how the fit was designed.

I am disappointed in the slacks.  The slacks winkle easily and the thigh area is out of proportion.  I would not wear other than for hanging around.  I am very disappointed in these pants.  I would return, but unfortunately I had them shortened.
For me , this was a good purchase !! They look good , feel good and wash up well .I will buy again .
I am a curvy girl (XL) and these are too short for my thighs.
This jacket was much smaller than my other rain jackets from Charles River. I ended up returning it.

I couldn't even figure out how to wear this sweater the fit was so odd. the arms cut off short and the seams don't hit your shoulders where they should. all the extra fabric around the collar is just confusing and unflattering. moving around in it was not easy. i will return this one!
I am of average height, but these pants are so long!! i considered altering them because i like the print, but i don't think it's worth the effort for workout attire so they're going back. shame!!
Does not fit to size I did not purchase this item because it was too large and very unflattering.
This is a really cute sweater. it's thick enough to keep you warm, but it just didn't look right on me. it made me look frumpy.

This is the first romper i've ever purchased and i'm instantly in love. it's flows, the colors are vibrant and the pockets are practical. looking forward to wearing it for the rest of the season as well as next year.

I love this top! although, i wish i had ordered the large rather than the medium. i am 5'4", 138 pounds and a 34d. the medium just fits but is ever so slightly snug across my shoulders. it will work; though i will probably have it dry cleaned rather than risk shrinkage by washing at home.
This item does not look like the Amazon picture.  Poor quality, run small very disappointed.
These fit well, slightly smaller than expected. the bottoms are a little too small, I do NOT like fitted pajamas. They will work though, if I order more I’d get a large.

This garmet was thinner than expected which is fine as I was looking for a short blazer to go over my dresses. I wanted something more tailored than a cardigan.  I ordered 3x based on the chart. The chart is accurate as far as my actual measurements but there is no room for other garments underneath without stretching to close the button. I have not decided if I would return and get a 4x. I may keep it. I am worried the shoulders might look too sloppy if I size up. Planning to order another in 4x before returning the 3x to compare. If 4x fits better around the waist without material pulling and is looser at shoulders needs shoulder pads I can add them.  May order other colors depending upon subsequent fit of the 4x.  I think this product is fine if you want a semi tailored look. I wanted something light for packing and traveling so this works for me. It's more of a light sweater than suit blazer.  The ruched sleeves are nice for a more contemporary look.  Since I am not using this in a formal office setting the sleeves are perfect. I did not wash it yet so I can not comment on wrinkles. It looked great out of the bag though. The seller included a complimentary face mask with this product which was a surprise.

I love my wrangler outdoors so I thought i would try these. I think the material and quality are great but they need to be pulled up way to high to fit. the belt line is just below your belly button. I bought a size s in the navy, and m in the neutral, and both fit. i usually wear a small, but they only had the size m left in the neutral. the m is a little big, but the extra room fits the flowy, bohemian style of the blouse, so it works. i love this top and am glad i purchased it in both colors. definitely recommend it.

Love this jacket! Originally bought it for game days but find myself mixing it with several pieces in my wardrobe! Can be dressed up or down! Heavy enough for chilly nights but not too heavy to take you into spring or fall. Great piece!

These pants are extremely comfortable and flattering. i bought them in coral, and wore with a black peasant top, sandals and a long necklace. they do stretch out a lot though, so i would recommend sizing down. i bought mine to look like they fit on the model, and after a few hours they were hanging off of me, so buy them a little bit tighter than you like. the drawstring is purely decorative and does not tighten the waist.

I don't recommend this sweater unless you are prepared for repairs.

Like some other reviewers, i, too, have to comment on the dress's fit. the dress doesn't fit right around the bust or the waist. as a seamstress myself, i know that the problem is that it doesn't have any darts in the bust, and thus the bust and the waist are just about the same size. this dress really just needed a few of these extra hidden details to fit right. while a belt helps, i don't think it helps enough to justify the price. it's too bad--i think the concept of it is cool, and i was rea

I love this skirt. the material is soft and beautiful. i love wearing it with black tights and boots. the skirt is quite a bit longer than how it appears on the model, however (unless the model is 10 ft tall!). i am 5'2" and if i place the skirt under my ribs, it reaches right above my knee. it works though and doesn't look bad. i would still recommend you buy this!

I love the pure and good short sleeve tees. they feel beautiful, and wash beautifully! i just hang them to dry and they are perfect for the next time, i buy a size medium as i like them to flow nicely at the hips!

I purchased the blue stripes and the black cat prints on sale and i'm very pleased. they each fit me a little differently as the black cats fit tighter through the arms, the stripes remain a bit looser throughout. no complaints here! i like the variation. i ordered a size small as i'm normally a size small (36c, 135 lbs, 5'2").

The button on mine was sewn just a smidge off, so the bottom does not line up quite right when buttoned.  I'm 5'7", 155lbs; 38" bust, 31" waist, 39" hip and ordered a medium.

......not for the long waisted. i immediately ordered this top when i saw it online. the embroidery is beuatiful (although it will require extra care). the soft lavendar color was a breathe of fresh air. however, i felt like i was wearing a maternity top as it hung oddly on my slim, 5'9" frame. i am long waisted so perhaps petites will find this top works for them. i agree with the other reviewer that indicated the arm openings are a bit large and deep. sadly, this one went back....

I bought these in my standard 27 (on sale, woop).  they are super comfortable with a bit of stretch for those days when you need a little extra room.  the ankles are easily cuffed and look great with ankle boots.  my only qualm is that they run a bit big and tend to gape in the back.  i love a higher rise jean and these are a great option but i'd lean towards sizing down.

Not worth it. You can wear it once.

Comfortable casual, hip. i have the black & white color which is a bit thicker than the other colors which i prefer as i recently had a baby and need a little extra fabric. i wish the fabric was a bit softer but the cut is so flattering there was no way i was sending it back. i wish the other colors were in the same thicker fabric and i would have ordered more. my new go to top. the black ribbon on the back is my favorite part.

In addition, around the neck the gathering is uneven, so in one section it’s a tight gather, others a little gather, and none in some. Don’t even get me started on the wrinkles. This arrived looking like an elephant sat on it for a year. You can also see it’s pretty shear. Maybe people who bought patterned versions didn’t notice all of this. I get that $28 isn’t a lot but I’ve paid a lot less for much higher quality.

I bought these to carry a phone in the pocket at work, my company recently started frowning on cargo pants. I'm slim, and the Wrangler relaxed carpenter jeans or cargo pants size 32 X 34 fit me fine for an active work life.  They are a little longer in the leg than I like (backside of pant legs drag on the ground).  I decided on 32 inch inseam, and these Technician pants are fine for length- just on my shoelaces.  The relaxed fit on these pants seem to be in the crotch, but hips are tight.  The 32" waist was TIGHT and 34" waist just slightly loose, however hips have room for a wallet, though it's tightly held.  I'm 6'0" and weigh 155#- definitely NOT overweight anywhere- so I think it's Wrangler's relaxed fit has changed.  I have these pants in 2 colors, and will definitely get another pair of the beige. Just be sure to buy the next waist size up!

These jeans will soon be unwearable less than 6 months after I bought them.

I'm a 58 year old woman and curvy - size 14 curvy.  I had an old pair of jeans which were size 12 Gloria Vanderbilts and they were a tad tight so I thought that ordering the Lees size 14 would do the trick.  Um, not really! I'll make good with these, and like I said I'll start exercising more.  I am not going to return these though because they do still fit, they're just a bit tight.  I need to wear a top that is flattering.Another thing I don't like about these jeans is that they are high rise.  My mid section is not model like and having the curves that I have makes the high rise sort of uncomfortable while sitting down.  As soon as they were delivered I tried them on and that's when I knew I should have ordered size 16.  However my husband had a good idea and advised me to leave them on for the night (before I put my pjs on).  I must say that was a good idea because I can tell that they have relaxed a bit. Loved the neckline and detail however it was far too small and I returned it.
This tank is pretty. it looks nice and is not cut too low. the bottom is "flowy" and not extremely fitted. i always get a lot of compliments when i wear it.

Here's what i liked:
great shape through body, cool empire waist. and good length
loved the color, more rust than red.
material was somewhat light which liked since i often get overheated in turtlenecks.

here's what i disliked:
the sleeves!! the reason they only show the model with her arms against her body is because the sleeves are ridiculous. they are just too big and too flowy. they will always be in the way of everything and there is no way to roll or push up.

It's soft and feels nice on skin.
true to size and fits just fine. more form fitting than model picture.

This fit well, but the top was very see through. this never would have worked for me. i'm glad i was able to try it on in the store and didn't order it online. with different fabric, it would have been great.

So disappointed in the abundance of polyester fabrics that retailer carries these days. especially at this price point. the pattern and style of this dress is beautiful, but i will never spend two hundred dollars (or even half that) on a poly dress. please add more linen, cotton, and silk!

The print on this dress is really pretty and the styling with the lace is a nice touch. unfortunately, it runs quite small in the bust, so i had to return it. for someone that is small busted, it will be quite cute. everywhere else it is true to size.

The dress had great potential, but the top sagged and made the dress look unflattering on me. unfortunately, i had to return it. the length was great, and the back and sides of the dress were nicely tailored and flattering. perhaps this would fit someone else better - i have a 34b/34c bust, and it didn't work for me.

This dress looks way better on you than sitting on the hanger! the design really flatters your body and the waist area, makes you look very skinny! highly recommend! the length is also perfect, just the right length for a maxi dress, long enough but short enough to show off your shoes as well!

I loved this dress when i saw it online, perfect for a summer wedding, but when i tried it on i was very disappointed. the fabric and styling are gorgeous and very high quality but the sheer amount of fabric on this dress is just not as pictured. there is layer after layer of silk and ruffle and while lovely, it made me look very large. i tried tying the belt many ways to no avail. sadly, it will have to go back. it may look good on a very thin frame but didn't complement my average one.

It is also very wind resistant...trust me - we live in a VERY windy area - so very happy with that as well.  Would purchase again.

I purchased or tried on at least six pairs of the same style and the fiber content was different if the color was different (a black pair was 100% cotton, a dark blue was 92% and a lighter blue was 82%). These were manufactured in 3 different countries. Just be sure to check the fiber content as you choose the color. The fit changes, especially in the waist as the fiber content changes. I was looking for a pant that didn’t have a lot of stretch and it was harder than I imagined. One color was only  50%+ cotton and stretched way too much.

I think some other reviews mention a chemical smell when these arrive. In my experience they understated the case by an extent that is difficult to describe.  These reeked when they arrived, to the point that the room I left them in overnight still stank to an uncomfortable degree a whole day after I removed them.  And it's not just a chemical smell; it is that, but somehow it also conjures a strong undertone of aged sewage and rotting rat.  They are fine otherwise (except the size/shape of the pockets is a little weird), and running them through the washer two or three times in a row cleared up the smell.  If you order these, plan to not open the plastic bag they arrive in until you have the time to immediately do laundry on repeat, because you don't want to spend any amount of time with these unsealed in their natural state.  Oddly, the walnut color version of these that I bought at the same time didn't smell at all, but both pair of black ones were an olfactory abomination (judging solely by the smell, likely also a fire hazard and known to cause cancer in the state of California).

I bought this dress for an early fall wedding, i usually wear a size 14 and bought a large. it was loose and swingy, very comfortable, almost too big. i would size down if you are in between. this dress was so easy to wear, i would definitely bring it on vacation. you can pair any type of shoes- flats, sandals, heels, wedges would all look good.

Size 8. 5'6" 155lb, (being modest) I have a tiny waist, broad hips, moderate butt. I carry my weight in muscular upper body, and dense lower body these days.I usually wear pretty curvy jeans, because the waste usually gaps in EVERYTHING I own. I wear a belt with ALL my jeans, because of the gap.These jeans fit well, enough that I might consider a size 6 next, with the expectation of a tighter fit. Not perfect fit in the waist, but they probably are a decent "curvy" fit. I liked Levi 529, this is a close next best.  I wear a belt so I dont have to keep hiking jeans up, but find I did pull these up several times a day.The legs are mostly straight through the thigh, a tiny bit narrower at the knee, but not much taper after that. I have solid thighs, and large calves (boot buying is never fun) and own slim ankles... these jeans do not cling, but wearing a neoprene knee brace underneath leaves no spare room. I might have considered a 6, but was hoping for space for the brace.The fabric feels like traditional modern denim, not 1920s canvas-denim, and not leggings style stretch-denim...., just modern denim with a tiny bit of stretch... which I hoped meant 2-3 days wear, without looking /feeling worn out.  But they just seem to relax over the first day, and bummer, feel like "5th day wear" on the second day... so to me, that's 1 day wear jeans.Color was good.
It looks cheap and very bad quality.

This is a beautiful dress. the quality is excellent. the 3 layers and the embroidery are beautiful... however it just didn't look right on me. it looked like a maternity dress. i am very petite, short with a big bust and it just did nothing for me. i think this style would look best on a tall woman with a smaller bust. unfortunately i will be returning this dress.

The wash is just as pictured, and the fit is great, i actually got a 29 when i usually wear a 28 but when i wear a belt with them they hug the waist perfectly. im always on the search from 28" length however these jeans are a 30" and still look excellent if i roll them up once.

put in wash before wearing and they came out with the zipper tongue missing.

as the previous reviewer mentioned it is extremely itchy material, which was already pilling on many of the dresses displayed in the store. the neck was extremely tight; a problem i've never encountered with any retailer dress. additionally it seems to have a kangaroo pocket located right underneath the bust line, which protruded in an unflattering way. the pocket is not at all not

I really loved them and the way they fit, but I’m extremely disappointed that they didn’t hold up in the washing machine.

Length wise it was fine, width wise it was way to wide and oddly wider at the hip area making me look like I gained 20 pounds. Not flattering at all. Gave the sweater to charity. Think it could be cute on a girl with curves.

First of all, this skirt is as cute on as it is in the picture. very flattering. i am a curvy gal on the bottom and this is flattering. that being said, it runs small. i purchased a large which is my usual size, and i need another inch or two all over to make it work. part of the problem is the material. it is a very heavy, durable upholstery like material. there is absolutely no give to this. it is a very stiff material as well -- more what i would expect on a sofa than on my skirt. the skirt c

I bought this top thinking i would wear this and feel like i was part of some fashion week, but it's cut way too large that i felt like a football player. this top is made for women with small shoulders and a super petite frame. also, the cut is way too big. i was swimming in this.

This is beautiful fabric and a good fit, but it's such a pain to get on and off, that i just don't want to hassle with it. the button is in the back, and very tricky to reach. too bad, because otherwise it's darling!
Beautiful dress with the colors and pleats. when actually on a person the zipper juts out. had to be returned!
This jacket looked adorable on. it was also quite comfortable. however, it sheds and left fuzz on every dark surface it touched. sadly, this is a deal breaker for me.

You ever get one of those shirts that feels like the fabric was printed onto? That's what this feels like. Probably ok for those not picky about feel or flow. I also was not fond of the neckline which is a problem for me not everyone else. My main reason for scoring is the fabric quality feels like a print on demand solution.

My perspective is as a sewer so i'm more picky perhaps. this top is poorly made. the fabric pattern is crooked or not consistent in each piece. sewers do this to save $ - squeezing the pieces on the fabric. it looks sloppy. the cut is very full; the bottom edge measures 104" around. for my figure, curvey, at 5'6" and 150lbs, this top is not flattering it looks maternity. perhaps best on a slim figure and with leggings.

I wanted to love this dress... and i did until i turned around. the back seam didn't hang right. it pulled towards the knotted side, across my behind. i tried on two different xs that they has in store and both had the same issue. one of the dresses hung much looser, i had to recheck the tag because i didn't believe it was the same size! disappointing because it really is pretty and showcases curves nicely.
Sleeves too big, was on the bigger end of xxl.I’m glad it didn’t have pockets in buttons at the collar but it was just too big and I hate the hassle of returning stuff 🤦🏾‍♂️

I ordered these along with the regular ag stevie jeans and there is a definite difference in fabiric and cut. i liked the darker fabric but it was thinner and stretchier that the more "denim" version. the cut was also looser in the thigh and seat area which made for a looser, less flattering fit. returned it and kept the regular ag stevie.

This is definitely again, a bit big. i'm usually a med, that is what i got, i could have gotten a small, but the arm holes might have been a tad tight then. i'm keeping the med, in case it shrinks, as it is part rayon, and rayon always shrinks if put in the washer. it is a great casual piece that will go with most anything. i love the tie, as you can then tighten the waist up a bit, or leave looser. the material is soft and not clingy. this is why i love a rayon blend. it hits me below my waist

I wanted to love this shirt. It's hard to find a unique top in black and white that has vertical rather than horizontal striping. This one is almost perfect -- but for the way it is pleated right at the v-neck, which makes this strange little pull-apart at the front bust area. I got my usual shirt size (medium), but perhaps large would have been better. Other reviewers have noted this, but I didn't think it would be as noticeable with the vertical pattern. Unfortunately, it's MORE so, in my opinion, especially when looking down -- which is so distracting and disconcerting. SO...if you're getting this pattern, perhaps size up unless you are very small/flat chested. The materials is matte look and light and breezy. Love the feel.
This tunic is simple and well made. it was not as long as on the model as on me but i am 5'-9".

Cute in concept, so large in reality. i am 5'3", size 24 in jeans. i was swimming in these. i mean the seat is huge and the length of the rise is super long. don't even try if you are a little person. long and lean, yes, would probably look great on you.

The sweater keeps your neck warm without the high collar of a turtleneck and the burgundy color is nice.  The material is a bit scratchy on the outside, but I didn't notice it as an issue on the inside.

Sadly, this has to go back. i am 5'5", 128 lbs and this shirt is super short on me. very short. and it's so wide it's almost a trapeze cut. the overall effect is 50s/60s style maternity shirt. which is disappointing because the fabric is beautiful, the detail is nice in person, even the sleeve cuffs are great. i am not very tall and i'm fairly thin on top so i can get away with a lot of styles, loose and tight. the combo of short and trapeze is just unflattering.

I saw tons of people raving about this piece so i had to check it out for myself. i love the vibrant colors and the design and while the fabric is delicate it feels amazing and light. i sadly had to leave it as the store as i am a girl with a larger chest and big hips. i looked huge and it was not flattering to my shape. if this dress came in a maxi with a high waist like i would be all over it. it is beautiful.

i you are younger and okay with showing lots of leg, go for it! its really cute!

I find this romper looks much more crisp on the picure than in real life. i find it more slouchier and shapeless even though i went with my "smaller size". the material is very soft, but thin, that is maybe the reason. i am not sure if i am going to keep. i wanted a bit more stunning look for my money. not saying this might be a great romper for somebody else however

I purchased this sweater in the blue and i love the color. at first i bought the regular size extra small. i am 5/2" and 102 pounds. i had to return the xs for the xxs petite. i like the arms to be long so i don't usually purchase sweaters in the petite sizes, but this one in the xxs petite the arms are still plenty long enough. it is still very roomy. it is very soft and comfortable, slightly itchy, i wear a very thin long sleeve shirt underneath.

These are not very nice joggers they are a really poor material, extremely thin almost a step above paper. The fit on them does seem a bit large and they don't seem to hug the body like other joggers. Maybe I'm just being picky but if you compare them to joggers you'd get at Marshall's or tj max these aren't in the same category as far as material goes. Could be a me thing but I did want to return them just got sidetracked and missed the window so I ended up keeping them. Me nor my girlfriend are a fan of them.

These tights are comfortable and the material is great. i bought the gray and holly color and the colors are as shown online. similar to most nylon tights they snag easily. definitely not a legging and similar to other reviewers these won't keep you warm in the winter.

This top is very pretty, but it fits funny. it's boxy and doesn't hang well. i feel like you could almost wear it as a 2nd-trimester-pregnancy-blouse. i tried the small & the small petite. they both fit the same (too big and too boxy), but the petite was shorter. i am 5'2", 125lbs, 34b. i preferred the regular length, but if you like your tops to end at your waistband, then the petite would fit too. i still really like the top, so i may try it in a smaller size when it goes on sale.

I was hopeful my size l would fit after another pair of leggings from antrho in this order was too small. these went on easier and i was feeling good until i reached the lower abdomen and everything came to a screeching halt. i'm not sure they are too small, rather, i believe, they are styled to be low-rise. not sure why anyone would want that in a legging, but i'm new to this athletic-wear trend. regardless, i won't be wearing these!

Very high waisted, length was awkward and waist was huge for a size 4.

I was very excited to finally get me a pair of Chubbies swim trunks. I see the ads everywhere and the designs are pretty cool. However, after receiving a pair I was appalled to see how cheap the material looks and feels. After one day of use the pockets already started having the sewing thread start falling apart.I understand the material needs to be thin to dry out quicker, but this is not what I expected Maybe I got a bad egg? No clue...However, the package was sealed tight brand new.I think UA does a much better job with this kind of technology. Honestly, pure highway robbery for $70.  There are plenty of other vendors with cool design options for under $50 out there. Get one of those instead.

Looks great if you're just standing around and arms are at your side, but this is the worst jacket I've had for reaching for anything. There's padding in the shoulders and it feels like the arm holes are lower, so it always bunches up and severely restricts movement if you're trying to use at a desk. I've been measured recently and sleeve length and chest fit, so the arm issue isn't a sizing thing.Updated: The more I wear this the more I absolutely hate it. Complete waste of money and should have got a refund. Again, the problem isn't the size, around the waste and chest, length of the back, and sleeve length, all are perfect. Whoever made this knows what a size is supposed to be. The problem is it is absolutely not a "classic fit." It's clearly trying to follow the tight sleeve around the upper arm trend, and failing. It's too tight on the biceps and bunches up like crazy, it's classic modern bad suit styling.

I bought this in black. The fabric is not sheer and doesn't cling. It's a bit thicker and heavier  than you might expect from a dress at this price point. I ordered my usual size, and the fit shows my figure without being bodycon. If you are like me and most jeans create gapping at the back of the waistband, you will probably find that this dress fits in a similar way, a bit loose above the butt, yet smooth across the front. There's enough stretch to accommodate larger hips or chests, but it doesn't show the contour of every little lump, and it doesn't highlight my food baby after eating a big dinner.I wear this almost every date night. I dress it up with a luxe cream-colored zip-up sweater and heels, or go more casual with a denim jacket and sandals or sneakers. The fabric and cut works for nearly every setting short of black tie.My primary gripe with this dress is that the straps are just barely set too close to cover my bra straps. The color was not the color I saw online. It was totally different.

These pants are really pretty and comfrotable, and i took a cahnce ordering them with a "31 inch inseam:, i thought perhaps they would work with a 4-inch heel...howeverm it is not the case, tey much be much longer than 31 inches. due to the cut out i will not be able to have htem hemmed, so htey must go back. if you are taller, i recommend, they are truly flattering.
too big

No way I could throw these on over shorts or leggings for hiking. I will have to return them after my trip. I was able to order a size XL to get here in hopefully 2 days before I leave and pay $13 more than the large. But I can't get the short ($28 more!!!) or petite ($13 more) in time. So I'm hoping the regular Xl will fit and I can still somehow make the length work.
These are not Jessica Simpson brand. They are a cheap knock off worth $20 at best.

I'm sure there's someone out there who will look good in this but it certainly wasn't me. admittedly, i'm a less than ideal body type at a curvy 5' tall. still for a taller person this shirt runs short, for a curvy person this does nothing to accentuate a waist, for a short person this pattern is very busy even if the colors are beautiful, for a busty person the gathers around the chest make for a very frumpy look, and even for a short and thin person this shirt runs too big to get a good fit. c

This is dress is great for an occasion - such as a wedding.

i wanted to keep this dress for such occasion - but there were 2 drawbacks. i ordered the dress online and when i opened the package, there it had some sort of oil/petroleum based product smell. the other drawback is the hips - it just flared out more than i wanted. i think that a belt would have solved that, but i usually don't find belts in my size.

as for the fit, it is true to size. i'm a true petite and the 00p fit great!
My husband is a slim guy, but even the small was enormous. Very relaxed fit, and he said the fabric was not super comfy.
Fabric is very thin.  Collar bundles up after 1 hand washing.  Armpit holes in a few weeks.  Amazon Goodthreads is 10x better and cheaper.
Bought 2 of these for my boyfriend size XL and they fit perfect. Love the colors of them
Totally see through.

I tried this jacket on in store, both m & l. both seemed to pull a little at waist/pocket (notice the raised pleat on the closeup. i ordered xl on line. it fits better but still seems to fit like the other two when fastened. snaps seem to be misplaced. on the plus side, the style is cute and there is brown (taupe) mixed in with the grey which is more flattering to brownettes. there isn't much difference in sizing of all three. i am not sure whether this is a keeper. open, it is fine and casual;
This wasn't a flattering look on me. It ran a little small through the bustline. It would probably look good on a more slender person.
The photo is pink. The color I received was peach.

I was disappointed when i got this romper in the mail. the picture looks much cuter than in person. although it's true to size, it looks pretty baggy on. also, i thought the grey (top) and blue (bottom) were too similarly colored; more contrast would have been nice. i'm returning this item.
Baggy along the back pockets.

This is a well-made kimono style jacket, in a great color choice that is versatile and well constructed. being short and with narrow shoulders, most kimono-style jackets don't work on me; they are simply too big & too long. this jacket's shorter length and more streamlined styling make it perfect for me. a keeper, and a real steal on sale.

If you love the print then this is the dress for you. it is so incredibly flattering for hour-glass shapes. and it has pockets! i wanted to keep it but i just did not like the pattern and every guy i showed it to hated the pattern. if they had it in a different color, i would buy it in every color. :)
I order a small it looks like I got a extra large. The material looks very cheap and thin. Doesn’t look nothing like the picture.
This is a thick sweater. it is pretty, but has a short length.

The dress is extremely high quality! i purchased the dress in black. the white collared shirt that the model is wearing under the dress is not part of the dress. the dress overall is like a balloon. unless you're extremely tall and skinny this dress makes you look bigger! i ordered the small petite and am 125 lbs and 5'4. i really wanted to like this dress but unfortunately it's going back:( the petite hits 3 inches above the knee for reference.

This item looks good and feels good.  Unfortunately, it is sized for a very short fat man.  It probably shouldn't look like a crop-top, right?  As a result-- my 5'5" wife inherited this one.  She loves it, and wears it regularly.

I love the color and the look, but the quality and durability of these pants are not worth $35. It's also pretty disappointing that Dickies refuses to produce these in 28x32 or even 29x32, so if you have a thin waist and are of completely average height, you're stuck with pants that don't cover the full length of your legs when you sit down. It's ridiculous. With how much they cut corners for quality, you'd think that would afford them to ability to produce some of these pants in more sizes that accommodate thin people, or cut the price down to what these things are actually worth. Dickies are also notorious, in my experience, for fading incredibly fast, especially in areas like the knees and the pockets (keys or medical inhalers in your pockets will leave fade lines after only a few days), etc. I just don't see this as an almost $40 product after taxes.
The top is a pretty color but arrived with streaks across the material in the back.  Perhaps they will come out when washed, but it looks like a dye problem right now.
The shape was not as nice on model, seemed like a lot of extra material.

So, this is a super soft comfy sweater. the color is great and i really wanted to love it. but the dolman sleeves sort of annoyed me. that being said, all of the good things about this sweater almost made me keep it. the neckline is also really neat. it drapes nicely, and stays that way. if you are on the fence give it a try!

I'm not much for ponchos, but this one looked unique. it is thin, kind of a felt material - that was expected - but i was surprised to find it was shorter at waist than how it appears online,, and it was wide horizontally. the colors were more muted and the design was slightly off center unlike pic. the turtleneck was thick and itchy. it was a return.

I purchased the teal/blue and the color is striking. though i put true to size the decorative top is slightly tight around the bust. and the bottom too is fitted and not flowy. for a looser fit you may want to size up. for a more fitted look it is true to size.

If you're looking for the look shown in the picture, order a size or 2 larger. I normally wear a 12-14 and ordered the XL and it's tighter than I want.  I ordered the burnt looking Orange and it's not the beautiful dark orange shown n the picture, it's more of a Halloween orange,

I like this top but unfortunately i will be returning. it's way too long. the color is pretty as is the design minus the length. it makes it look frumpy. maybe if they offered it in petite or if you're taller, it would work for you.

Definitely was disappointed in the fit of this potentially very cute shirt. just too large; too much fabric for me. i'm usually an xs and there was just no shape to that size for my small bod. i wouldn't have minded the longer length if there had been a better fit up top. i think the colors are also a bit duller in person. love the concept though!

This top has a really pretty pattern and is good quality, but was just too boxy for me. i also felt like the sleeves were a little odd/big. 

the fit is tts, though slightly shorter then it looks on the model.

I purchased this dress in the green, and while the print and material were lovely, the extra folds in the neckline made the dress look frumpy up top. the billowly bottom made it look like a bag. i am 5ft, 36d and 29" waist and the size 2 fit, which makes me think this runs large! i'll be returning this dress.
Washes well . It is the perfect baby blue !
I love the way these jeans look and fit, but they have a chemical smell. i assumed the odor would go away after i washed them, but it doesn't seem to have helped.

I love how warm it isI was afraid I’d look fat in it but I really don’tI’m 5’5 135 lbs and the medium fits really nice over a heavy sweatshirtThis coat sells for $180 in the Dicks sporting goods store, so the price was great !
these are great shirts at a great price point, loose and slight athletic fit all in one... the problem I have is the polyester builds an odor quick but washes out quick.

use it as a pajama

Had to return this one. I ordered the XXL and it fit like a medium. The shirt was SO short. Like barely covered my belly button. No stretch to it, and just all around tight. I will say, it did look exactly like the photos. The color was spot on (ordered the green) and the sleeve detail was very pretty. Sad it didn’t work for me!

I found this dress to be beautiful. only down side? you'd need to size up two sizes if you have any breasts or butt. i'm usually size s/m in maeve. i bought this in l and looked like a stuffed sausage. i'm 5'1", 140lbs, 36d, 39" hips. i'd need an xl.

In paper crown dresses, i wear a small or size 6, so for this top, i ordered a small. it was huge on me! for reference, i'm 5'7", 130 lbs, 34a. it is very wide towards the bottom, and it flares out way more than in the picture. the material is also a little stiff, so it really sticks out. even if i sized down to the xs, i think the bottom would still look unflattering, so i'm returning this.

I have been buying these shirts for a couple years and they have always been high quality.  The ones I received recently weren't as soft and nice as the ones I bought earlier.  These are kind of rough and scratchy. They also don't fit as well.  I think Amazon may have changed the supplier of these shirts.
Great pair of shorts.  Fit just right.  Lite weight, durable, and very comfortable.
Loved the fit but a hole ripped open near the fly after only a few times wearing them.

This is a great jacket.  It fits true to size and has just the right amount of stretch to it.  The buttons are solid and work well, they are easy to use.  It looks really great with all kinds of outfits.  I love the look of it.  It's really well made.
Disappointed in the quality of the product, the black parts rub off on the shirt itself.

Absolutely stunning top! love! what a great buy on sale! i wear a medium/large and purchased the size 12...fits perfect! beware that the bottom has somewhat of a flair! the material is light so i would say this top is something to be worn transitioning between seasons, late summer to fall!

This is the dress that i have been waiting for all season. perfect color. the material is also "firm" without being heavy or thick (if you know what i mean). it lays flat and smooths out any bumps without being overly stiff. the v-neck is also not too deep and the sleeves are not too short. overall, a complete win. now go and make it in gray and navy blue please.

Normally a size 14/16 dress, 38F. I ordered an XL which was a tiny bit roomy bit nothing obvious. I love ALMOST everything about this dress. The quality is excellent. Not thin or sheer. Great stretch, cut, fabric, and color. My only complaint is, the weight of the dress pulls the dress down therefore you have to wear a demi bra. Anything higher cut will be exposed. The dress doesn’t feel extra heavy but the dress definitely works it’s way down. I didn’t realize this until I was already at work. Spent the day pulling up the top. 😕 That being said, I love everything else about this dress so gonna give it another shot in a smaller size in hopes it’ll make a difference.

I am so pleased with this midi dress; i've already worn and laundered this dress multiple times and i cannot express how comfortable and cute this dress is to wear. best of all, the fabric is just substantial enough that there are no posterior lumps or panty lines that are visible and the v-neck is just low enough to provide a subtle sexy dÃ£Â©colletage. i love the length of this dress as i really dislike my knobby knees and this exposes enough leg from the sides and disguises the ugly knees for me

Very nice and true sized. Excellent coverage not sheer at all
I was unhappy that it did not fit; a medium usually fits me.  I did like the fabric and the way it was stretchy.  I wanted it to do physical therapy in.

I ordered this for my son’s 1st communion. I got a size 16, which fit too snug and the vest is like 2 sizes too small. I like that it shipped out fast! I didn’t not like the material. These fit fine (I have several colors) but these have no crease whatsoever. Even after ironing they will not hold crease very disapointed.

Just received this gorgeous blouse and i couldn't be happier! it's stunning! not sheer at all, but light and breezy. i typically wear a medium, sometimes a small, but i ordered the medium since velvet tends to be a little tight in the shoulders on me. this medium is a little roomy so it fits more like a tunic - which is what i've been looking for all spring. the blue is even prettier in person - a true blue. a perfect find!

I love the color of this dress. it is not flattering, even though it should be. the weird panels of different materials makes it hang super funky. the lace is heavy but the silky panels aren't. so not flattering, it's just odd. and the fit is super huge, you are swimming in it in addition to a poor body drape. it could have been so cute, but was executed so poorly.

I never write reviews, but i just purchased this top at full price last week in the store. it's not a have to have top just to look at it, but once i put it on i had to have it. it's extremely comfortable and i am able to wear it while running around with my boys and still feel as though i'm put together.

(5ft) i think this is versatile enough to wear to work, party or a casual wedding. the fit is perfect - hugs at the correct spots. the fabric feels really soft and silky and feels a bit heavy which allows it to drape nicely. overall - i love it.

I wasn't sure the shorter length in the back was working until i tried it on. this jacket totally worked for me. the brown color can be easily matched with other colors. i got the jacket in medium size. i usually in between size. the medium size allow more space on the chest area, however the sleeve becomes a bit too long for me.

I love these leggings - they look and feel great, but i can't wear them out of the house! there is no elastic in the waistband, so they are constantly falling down. i won't dare wear them out, for fear they will fall down when i walk across the street. everything else about the leggings is exactly what i was looking for: style, comfort, and warmth. they are great for curling up to read a good book in front of the fire; not for doing anything active.

This is an interesting skirt. the fabric is comfortable, breathable and flowy. it is eye-catching. but the pattern is not one i would say i love, although i do like it. the lighter color in the pattern is more pink than off-white, which is fine, but that did surprise me a little. overall, i kept it for comfort and because i liked it enough for the sale price i paid for it.

I purchased this sweater because of the cute unique diagonal design. however, i was largely disappointed by the fiber of the sweater, it is rather coarse to the touch and a bad fit. on the model it looks nice, but it was large around the torso, yet short at the same time creating an awkward and unflattering fit. i shall be returning it.
These pants are for very overweight people. Not sure how they can say they are a 29 W. You swim in them!

Perfect fit! Exactly what I was looking for!

I loved the aesthetic but as a true hourglass shape, i was frustrated that it didn't have a little more give as i tried to pull it over my head. the fabric was stiff, and seemed to be lace over cotton? not entirely sure. i couldn't get past the feeling off the material.

ORIGINAL REVIEW (2 STARS): I bought a pack of these because you really can't beat the price. I had been buying Hanes Beefy Tees, but at 9-12 bucks per shirt, I was ready to pinch some pennies. The one I tried on straight from the package fit me nicely, though it was a little longer than I'd like. I expect they'll shrink in the wash, which would be ok as the fit was just slightly loose.However, there was a hole in the front of the shirt! I didn't look at the other 4 from the package, I just packed them up for exchange. Hopefully the second go 'round yields better results. I'll update/add to my review as necessary.UPDATED REVIEW (3 1/2 STARS): The replacement pack of shirts arrived and none of them have holes! They shrunk in the wash a bit, but still fit well enough. Still a good deal if you're just looking for cheap plain tees!

This is such a cute sweater and I would 100% buy more, but the quality keeps me from spending the money on them. I washed this sweater about 6 times and on the 6th wash, half of the stitching that keeps my cuff on the left arm came undone. After following washing instructions, it was a surprise that it fell apart so quickly.

I was so excited to try these but was really disappointed in the fit. i found the legs and butt to be tight but the waist to be really big. if you are normally a size 24, i wouldn't bother with these.
would buy from Charles River again

Ok, this is a nice quality product. However it runs very small and being 100% cotton shrinks no matter how careful you wash and dry/don't dry!! They make a very nice crewneck version of this but the fabric is different and therefore so much better.

My inseam is 33", so unless I visit a tailor, my pants seldom fit right. With its Essentials brand, at least for some waist sizes, Amazon has quietly thrown a bone to untold millions of men with legs like mine, as well as men in the 29" and 31" inseam demographics, who walk around every day in pants that are too long or too short. I bought these jeans to have something that fits well and is comfortable enough to wear while picking orders and operating forklifts as I attempt to buy the dip in the economically uncertain months or years ahead. These jeans have stood up well in the short term, and I may end up returning for a pair in 32x33, the next size down, in the future.
This Columbia jacket is worth the money..it has a feel of lightness yet very warm...like a sleepingbag feeling .it also is true to size ..worth the money

Really cute suit but way too small up top. not enough coverage under arms and across bust.i wish retailerpolgie carried bathing suits in the stores so they can be tried on. this is the 2nd suit i have ordered that had to be returned. i wont order a bathing suit again as its just to much of a risk.

When I looked in the mirror later that night, I was upset and realized I hadn’t done or worn anything to cause that.  Since I had worn it, I didn’t return.  I had bought the same sweater in dark green with no issues.  I bought a sweater shaver which made an improvement.  Buyer beware!
Sweater fits nicely except for the sleeves. Sleeves become very wide and is too big in the arms around the wrist area. The blue faded quickly after one wash.

now on to the size... i'm a plus size girl (size 18) and based on reviews saying the dress was huge, i ordere

Hands down the absolute best jean short they make!! Such a flattering fit!

These pants are cute. they seem, to me, to have a wider leg than appears on the model. they do run big, so i would recommend sizing down if in doubt. these are cute pants that can be dressed up or down, but unfortunately, look pretty sloppy by the end of the day, as they stretch and wrinkle very quickly. since they already run a bit big, this is a major negative. i wore them to church, and they were quite wrinkled by time i got home. by late afternoon, they looked like a different pair of pants.
The material is of great quality cotton. My dad loves them. Although, he does wear the size I purchased, it was somewhat on the too larger side. I recommend getting a size smaller. Great pajamas 😃

(please make more!!) however, this shirt didn't work for me. i think it's a matter of where your curves live. the shirt was true to size, but my boobs meant i was showing more cleavage than the model, and the top part felt more like a bib than embroidery. sad coz it is lovely and feels lovely on. probably a great shirt for different body types. would love to see more green clothing....

I was looking for this style in purple all summer long. This was the perfect dress. Except it wasn't. The bust section was ill fitting and the smocking couldn't overcome that. Very sad I had to return this.

It will do for sleeping.

I just received my order for 541s in the color "Sequoia," and they are MUCH darker than shown on Amazon's website. That isn't a problem if you like really dark blue jeans, but I was expecting something much lighter. I checked the PC9 code (found on the laundry instructions label), and the Levi's website says that what I got is "Dark Wash." So, it could be that Amazon simply shipped the wrong thing; maybe the photo *is* correct? I won't know until I get the replacements I requested.Update, a week later: Amazon sent my replacements, and they're exactly the same as the first shipment. I did *not* receive "Sequoia." The PC9 code on these is 18181-0027. I've tried to reach Amazon service to explain their problem to them, but there's no easy way these days to reach a human who might understand. So, again, if you like "Dark Wash," go ahead and order. There's nothing inherently wrong with the jeans, they're just not the "Sequoia" color shown on the web page.

Pants fit, legs do not!!!No one in my family has bird legs. even at 100lbs  5'3.Elastic is super tight. Can't bend legs to play catcher.It's like they are a pegleg cut.Go for Mizuno. Everyone likes how they fit.

He said this morning he hopes they soften up with further washing as he likes them otherwise. So I am waiting before buying another pair.

The shirt size is true and it’s well made; however, the color is much more peachy than pale pink. I don’t hate it, but it doesn’t match the color shown.

As pictured and very comfy.

i got this to wear for speech and debate.it fits well, if not a wee bit large, but that can be due to the cut of the jacket.the jacket comes down to just above my hips, for lack of a better term, right above/at where the thigh and hip fold. my torso is about 33.5 inches long. bust 41, waist 31 and hips 42.the pockets are sewn shut, but they may be sewn shut for display purpose- such is common for suit items.it's a double button jacket- when both buttons are done, the amount of your shirt underneath the jacket that is exposed is minimal. this shouldn't be much of an issue, depending on the kind of shirt you wear under. lower shirts that sit on your bust(think tube tops, bandeau tops, basically any shirt you'd want a strapless bra lol) may look a little strange. but higher necked tank tops and normal dress shirts should look fine.comparing this to the one button ck blazer i already have (bought at macy's, same size), this blazer has more room in the sleeves.the sleeves are padded, and there is no pocket on the left breast.

I owned an Ascender jacket for many years and used it as a fleece layer for warmth.  And I love the fabric, which is somewhat water repellent unlike fleece.  As far as I could tell, Columbia is the only outdoor company that makes a lightweight jacket out of this material.This purchase was a replacement for the original jacket, which finally just wore out. I wish I could give this a higher rating. I took it on a recent trip to Iceland and used it every single day, since the temp there always hovered around 50 and it was rainy. The darn thing failed me, unfortunately.  This jacket zipper failed me in my hour of need. Unlike my original jacket, which had a beefy zipper with big teeth, this one had really fine teeth. The first time I zipped it up, it separated down at the bottom. Unless I was really careful when putting the zipper together, the separation happened frequently.  Once it separated, I always had a helluva time getting it unzipped again.Unless Columbia corrects the zipper issue, I would not buy this jacket again. Unfortunately I'm now past the return/refund window, so I'm going to pay someone to replace the zipper with a heavy duty one like the original.  :-(

I’m 5’7, 135lbs, on a scale of Kim to Kendall butt, I have a Kourtney. And I got a size 28 (:*I did originally order a 27 and it was wearable but not at all breathable, 28 was perfect.Pros: The quality is great. They’re a true vintage high rise fit. They are loose enough to breathe and be comfortable which is perfect since there’s no stretchiness in them at all. They are great coverage,  so even if you bend over your butt cheeks won’t show.Cons: So while they fit perfect around the waist and hips, the cut off at your legs is horrendous lol. In the last picture, the piece I’m holding was attached with strings that went over my thigh but it was so bad and even tighter than the actual shorts so I had to cut them out. The third and forth picture show what I mean, sitting down you will have biscuit can bulging thighs, period. Lol and they roll up when sitting down so it can get really uncomfortable quick…and as you can see the space on my waist and belly area even when I’m sitting so it’s not that the shorts are overall too small. When standing they aren’t tight around my thighs at all though. Also, in the third pic when I’m sitting, that poof that looks like my belly is actually space just more space in the shorts. Lol. The last two cons I have aren’t really cons that just are weird little things about the shorts that bug me but not enough to actually call them cons. So first one is the crinkle on the butt in the center area. I dont have a huge booty but I have a booty, if that makes sense, so it’s just a weird thing they do I guess. If you have a bigger butt you may not have that issue idk. The second thing is there’s 5 buttons. Which isn’t an issue expect the lowest one is LOW lol and it can be a booger to get them in the loops as some of the loops are not that big.So to sum it up, they’re great shorts for anything that doesn’t involve a lot of sitting.

I liked the color distribution of this pack, which is why I opted to buy it rather than the Hanes or Fruit or the Loom undershirts I’ve worn in the past. While those brands have some differences in the hem and ribbing, they essentially fit the same. These Gildan tanks fit very differently, in an unflattering way. The arm holes are angled, with the shoulder straps much closer to the neck and far off the shoulders. The result is that the straps peek out from an open collar. If you’re a woman wearing these, bra cups are left halfway exposed. Not a good fit!

These jeans didn’t last three months before they fell apart. What sort of hard scrabble, rough, grueling work have I put them through to cause this, you ask? Why, I drove my children to school 8 minutes away and drove them home. Well, certainly if I am wearing this $60 pair of jeans day in and day out and and washing them nightly on the old timey washboard out back by the creek… I can’t even finish this fantasy scenario. I live in a modern home in Houston, I’ve worn these occasionally and washed them as such. They’ve been through nothing extreme, and yet I have T-shirts that have lasted over a decade while these things disintegrated less than 90 days after I received them. I am beyond frustrated, particularly since the return period was a month after purchase and these didn’t make it two months beyond that. Shameful.
Cute and comfy! i usually wear a small but bought a medium because it appeared to run a little small.

The dress completely tore up the entire back exposing me in a way I wish it hadn’t on a night out with my family. I was mortified. No reason for it either - I literally just sat down in it and when I got up I felt a breeze. Zero stretch to material and clearly piss poor stitching.
The dress runs big you should size down. i find the weight to be great for mild winter weather. the length was longer than i expected based on previous reviews.
I returned this dress for color only. It was not a true red and not a good color for my skin tone.

This top has a flattering shape. the neckline is low, but not too low for work, and it flares a bit at the bottom. my only complaint is that it is short. i have a longish torso and this shirt hits right at the top of my pant's waistline. i just prefer tops to be a bit longer, but it's still a cute top.
I kept this top, only because i needed a plain black tank, but there is nothing special about it. i found it a bit large and thin cheap material.
