Loved the green color. Great quality material. The style of dress was just ok. But the sleeves were too short and if you didn’t tie the front just right it looked weird.
I liked the pattern and bright colors but it shrank after just 1 cold water machine wash on the gentle cycle.  Very disappointing!

These felt like they were cutting off circulation around the calves. i tried pulling them lower to reduce the tightness but that made them way too droopy between the legs. an alternative would be to clip the elastic, but ultimately decided to return.

Just got this dress and am very pleased.  fell in love with the bright color in the store and then came home ordered it at a great sale price!!  color is as shown...beautiful lace trim at the bottom.....back longer than front as described and pockets!!  i am 5'2" and length on a large comes to just below the knees..in front....i may wear leggings under it...dont like the slip as it is far too tight...will wear a tee or turtle under it..  quality heavier fabric. roomy... linen and cotton.
Warm and comfortable. Durable and stylish. This is my third one I bought. Worth the money.

There is no stretch so please think to order a size up or two and remember it is going to shrink.

This romper is cute, well-made and true to size, but i haven't figured it out how to put this on without having someone tie the back ties. which pretty much means that going to the bathroom is not an option while you have this romper on. not sure what the designers were thinking here. i'm returning this one.

What a shame because the material is soft & comfy, but the sleeves and pants(Medium) were way to long for a person 5'7". Perhaps, if you were 5'9" or taller, the PJs would not be too long. Also, the material is definitely lightweight, as they say.

Picked this up on sale - was on the fence about the bright reddish/orange coloration, but it really says summer and goes so easily with multiple summer pieces. it is generously cut and made very well. i've worn it on cooler/rainy days and it really brightens everything up. best part is that it launders well too.

This dress is perfect for me (i'm very bohemian/rocker vs prim, & flowy vs structured). it will be in regular rotation for years. it's slim through the shoulders and arms, and flowing everywhere else. love the pockets. the fabric is light, but i love in so cal, so it's great. i'm wearing it right now with gray skinnies, heeled clogs, and a scarf. i'll also wear it all summer as a dress. so perfect. i'm 5'4, 140lb, 34b, and the 8 fits perfectly.

Way too big and had a granny like styling. was very excited but ultimately took it back.

These are very well-made jeans, the fabric is substantial and gives a lot of stretch with movement. i adore the extra inch or so in the rise of the waist, and they make my butt look great. however, these jeans fit like a glove when i put them on first thing, but within an hour or so of wear they are so baggy it's like wearing a size bigger. i'd say perhaps buy a size smaller if you want them to fit snugly through the day. if you like roomy, then buy your regular size.

Decent.. loose and/or  just right in certain body regions but kinda of expected due to my body dimensions..i.e. b/c size chest, muscular arms, small layer over my abs and plump tush . Comfortable material but would've liked lighter material.

This was purchased for an 8th grade graduation. My son stands at around 5 feet 4 or 5, and he is of average build for his age. We couldn't find anything "reasonably priced" at the local department stores nor specialty shops, so ended up looking online. Surprised to actually find suits on Amazon. Bought several to try, and this one stood out, with its "slim fit" cut. The jacket fit my son perfectly. The vest was loose on him, but we didn't use it. The pants needed alteration, but that would be the case of any purchase.Because we knew he likely will be wearing this suit just this once (still growing and we don't usually have occasions to get this dressed up), we just needed a very nice suit without breaking the bank. This purchase was excellent for our need. The price was very reasonable, and the quality was good. To be picky, I did have to snip off the ends of a few threads here and there. But, otherwise, I don't have anything negative to say about it!Refer to the attached photos. I'd say he looked great in it!This was a sensible purchase and I would recommend it 100%.

Timeless jacket that I got to use for a biography costume at school.  It is a very nice quality.  My son normally wears a 10 but I got him a 12 so he would have room to grow.  It is not as big as I was expecting it to be but is still slightly large on him.  The fabric is smooth and feels very high end.  It is made of polyester, rayon, and spandex.  It has very little give to it.  The lining is 100% polyester and is smooth but feels like polyester instead of silk.  It has two buttons on the front and three down each sleeve.  It only has one partially functional pocket on the outside.  It is the one on the top left chest.  It has a slight pocket that can only really accommodate a handkerchief.  The two lower pockets are faux pockets.  There is one pocket in the inside.  It also has shoulder pads that give a more stately appearance.Overall the jacket fits nice and looks good on.  My son hasn’t complained about it being uncomfortable or rubbing anywhere.  It is a thin jacket and provides little warmth.  It works out well for us since he had to wear it inside.  It is a classic blue color that is neutral and easy to pair with other colors and designs.  It was nice that I could use it as a costume but can also use it for dressy clothes for my son.  It worked great for us.  I would recommend it

I  did not liked the fact that this was a denim print and not the denim of the past. The fit was typical of what I have tried in the past from Lee product. Fit for a man’s figure not a woman’s. But to top it off I was charged for one item approximately 27 hours after delivery. Not what I call very fitting. They arrived the day after I ordered them, I tried them immediately, and was about to take them to the UPS store when I decided to wait till the next morning. I found a return label in the bag and took it the next morning after 9AM. Then Saturday evening I see an Email I have a charge of $38.22 made at two something in the morning Eastern time. I thought I was hacked!!! I call Amazon’s number on my Chase Amazon card. On the third try I got a good connection. The first two were static and muffled. Not a good thing for conveying info. This poor soul could not help because of the hour of the day, most other dept were closed. He kindly offered to call me later when I would be able to talk with the dept. I needed. I said no because everyone in my house would be asleep. That was the end of my conversations with Amazon.  So my take on Try Before You Buy? FORGET ABOUT IT! You don’t need more headaches in your life!!

Nice t-shirt. the print is very nice and the fabric is soft and flowing. i love the baseball cut, it gives it a different look.

I love the simplicity and modernity of this tunic; however, the pockets ruin it, if that's possible. they make the dress bulky around the hips. i usually wear an 8 or medium and i ordered this dress in a medium. i think this brand runs a little small. the bulky pocket issue may be solved with a larger size. the weight of the fabric is a little heavy which prevents year-round wear. i love the subtle texture. one odd thing, the tag is attached to the stand-up collar. i had my hair up when i tried

these shorts are so cute, but they are extremely small. i ordered an xl, which isn’t even on the size chart they have posted, but by all accounts is my normal size for bottoms. these barely came up above my knees they were so small. my friend who is normally a size 8-10 could hardly get them buttoned. not for curvy women at all 😭 for reference my waist is 36in and hips are 49 in.

Not sheer at all. No zipper problems. I’m 5’4” with a longer torso and it hit everything well and wasn’t ungodly too long. Tall girls out there: this may not be for you. It didn’t seem the most stretchy, but not in a bad way. It was comfy still and I could still eat a full dinner comfortably. My biggest qualm was that the slit was way more centered on the dress than the photo will lead you to believe. You can pull the slit to the side, but it throws off the seam line in the back in photos and I had to readjust alllll night. That’s the only downside though.
Got 2 sizes up. I went one size up and it didn’t fit comfortably.

I am a 5'10" size 4 (or 28 long - i need a 33-34" inseam) woman. i bought the s/m and they fit perfectly (with all the excess length bunching at my ankles, as designed)! i'm thrilled. i bought the light color. one thing, wear nude underwear and lighter (or just short) socks - these are definitely see-through! however, i only plan to wear these with long tunics and sweaters anyways - something always reaching down to my upper thighs, at least. so comfy and cozy!

I really wanted to love this everything about this piece. especially after reading all of the great review i was so excited and looking forward to getting this dress. unfortunately it just did not work out. i ordered a large and it fit fine but the dress did not give me the faltering shape i had read about and was hoping for. it literally just hung on me and made me look wider. sadly i had to return this.

I typically wear a size L and I ordered this in a size L in white. This was a little more off-white than white in person. The large was the right choice though I possibly could have sized down to a medium. I was disappointed with how low cut this shirt ended up being. If you don't have much cleavage you'd be just fine, but this was a little too low for me. The worst thing about this shirt is where the pleating and v come together. I could wear a nude bra under it and it didn't show in any place, except for right there. For some reason it seems to highlight whatever you have on under it. (Just to be clear- you can see what you have on through the shirt.) Otherwise, this seemed like a comfortable shirt, great length, nice flowiness. I would say mid-quality though I don't know how it handles wear. Just ended up not being for me.
I found the sleeves were a little long. I had to shorten them since they nearly covered my entire hands and I have always had long arms!

I am six feet tall so this will definitely be a tunic with jeans or leggings but if you are shorter it could easily be a dress. lovely pattern with soft cozy fabric. nice weight and hangs well. definitely a keeper!
Cute fit but... split in the thigh after two weeks. and i'm not a big gal. poor quality.

These trousers arrived today. yippee. i really wanted to love them. i do like the color and the cut. not crazy about the fold-over waist. the fit through the waist, hips, and thighs is true to size. the biggest issue is that the description states that the inseam is 31.5" which is perfect for me. however, these pants are actually 33.5" in the inseam which makes heels a necessity if i want to wear them without altering them. i rarely wear heels these days, so that does not make me happy. one leg

Who can't pass up a deal, right? At $15 I thought I was getting a great deal...I mean compared to the name brand, made in USA that I pay $40+ for. Well as we all know you get what you pay for and Amazon is here to keep reminding us that. First, construction is great! Material choice, well lets just say, they inner short, spandex like material does an excellent job at retaining moisture. Yes it does stretch but no where I need it to. The cut of the inner short has no contouring or cut to 'support the boys' hence wearing these command will be a no go from hear on out. Moist is a good word to describe my over all experience. The outer short is is made of a heavier but light weight material. It feels smooth, doesn't appear that it will snag and looks good. I like the pockets, drawstring and t-shirt/towel loop holder - smart design. This outer fabric has some stretch but not enough to do much more that sit...don't try yoga with these because any stretching behind that of a coach potato and you'll experience resistance in all the wrong places. I'm a true medium and these make me feel like I have more of a booty that I do. (meaning these were cut for those flat butt types - no hate, just saying).All in all - you get what you pay for. If you are on a budget, this is a no brainer, buy now! If you are not looking for any type of support for the boys with the added bonus a non-breathable fabric, look no further, these are of you! If you've got some extra case and the fertility Dr. doesn't want the boys to over head then break out that wallet and look for a name brand alternative that's 4x the price.

Now I would suggest get a good measurement of your waist and go with that because when they relax they relax I went up a size just have the extra comfort.

I got this top in navy and i love it. it's loose and flowy and comfortable, yet dressy enough to wear for work (or dress down with jeans). i'm 5'4", 125lbs and the 6 was a bit large on me. i could've sized down a little but i actually liked the loose fit, and the length was long enough to tuck in if i wanted to. definitely recommend.
I love this shirt. the quality is great, and very soft. the length seems a bit short, i will only wear it tucked in to a higher waisted skirt. the arm holes are tight.
I liked the color and flowiness but busty buyers beware, the dress has no stretch. I had to buy the bigger size to fit my chest and the rest of the dress swallowed me like a circus tent.

This is a great feminine top i just wish it were a little bit longer for my taste, it hit about two inches below my belly button. it was a little snug around the belly area so that's why i feel it runs small for the brand, usually the brand runs true to size but not for this top

Good looking shirt, but the size was nowhere near accurate. I had to return it. I have a 54” chest, and they advertised that the shirt had a 56.9” chest. It was at LEAST two sizes too small. Nowhere close.

I ordered the size recommended based on the size chart, but it was WAY too big. For reference I'm 5'7", 150 lbs, 28" waist, 34C. Medium was huge and just not a flattering cut. Not going to reorder this one.

I originally bought this in a medium (for reference - i am 5'10", 155 lbs.). it was tiny! i sent it back for a large and it fits beautifully. the fabric is incredibly soft and the dress is very flattering and comfortable. i would just recommend ordering up a size.

The PJ top fit according to size ordered, but the pants fit for a man that was 4 feet tall.I was very disappointed in this Hanes product.If your are selling an irregular item be upfront with the customer!!!

Wow this is huge! i'm all for the tent-look with the right style, but this was absurd. i could have fit two of me into the width, and with the peplum style, extra width doesn't flatter anyone. the fabric is also so thin that it doesn't hang nicely, it kind of floats around the body. if you want a wide top, then this is perfect, but if you wanted something that hangs nicely, look elsewhere. i purchased a petite s, my typical size.
This jacket isn't as structures as i thought but it is very comfortable. runs true to size and feels nice. i am looking forward to wearing this in the fall

I admit at time when ordering shirts from Amazon it’s a gamble. This shirt fits beautifully! I’m 5’6”, 160lbs, short torso and 34D bust. It fits great! It’s flowy but not a moo moo. Untucked the front of the shirt is about 1” from my crotch and covers most my butt. The shirt gives me shape without hugging my sides or stomach.  I ordered the purple and it’s a beautiful eggplant color. It didn’t shrink when I washed and dried. It’s a light weight cotton blend but feels like a cotton T-shirt. I’m definitely ordering more. Very nice casual work shirt or everyday t shirt.

I've been looking at this jacket on line and finally went to the store to try it on. i really liked the styling but the denim was quite stiff. i'd prefer a softer kind of fabric. i wonder if it would soften if it was washed. also, it ran surprisingly small. i usually take an xsmall or small but the small didn't leave me enough room to comfortably bend my arms. the medium worked better. i wonder how others feel about the fabric and and the sizing. i think i'll wait and see if this one goes on sal

i love this so much!

I loved these and wore them once (i bought the red ones) and the stained my furniture and my shirt so i washed them a few times in hopes of getting out all the extra dye- ruined yet another chair!!! so annoyed. i loved them but they are not worth it.
The package came with 3 pairs. They were not all the same size!
Honestly, I’m sure this is darling on someone who is a size 2. I however looked like a potato. Not friendly to big chests

Not happy at all!!! This is absolute rip off! $50 dollars for some made in china brand! Do not waste your money people! I would suggest going to stores in person. They are not sending Columba authentic jackets now!

My favorite colors are purple and green, so when i was in the store and saw the beautiful purple flowers on the top of this blouse and all up and down the sleeves, i was was blown away. i was disappointed by the bottom of it, just huge, flowy, green fabric with no design on it whatsoever. i went with my first impression and bought it, but now that i'm trying it on in the house, i'm still bothered by the throw-away bottom of this blouse. i'm thinking this is just another retailer maternity t

I wear a 35" waist with all my pants I get. BUT, when I ordered these, they were WAY TOO SMALL. About 2 sizes too small, so they went back. Do yourself a favor and order at least 1 size UP. And do the TRY BEFORE YOU BUY option.

The concept of this top is cool and the outer fabric is nice. the inner layer is sheer but as long as you're wearing a nude-colored bra, no big deal. however i did find the inner layer to be scratchy. they must've photoshopped the fit of the top on the model or altered the top, because it looks like it hangs straight on her. i ordered an xs and when you pull it out of the package, it clearly flares out & is a-line. so as a previous reviewer stated, it looks huge from the front. if it had fit the

Bought this in white and the golden embroidery makes this piece very elegant looking. it is a bit sheer, but with a lace bra definitely very nice. that is the only con, i wish it would be not sheer at all. but it is too beautiful to send it back for that reason.

This dress is really cute.  And I was really thinking about keeping it- I did the Try before you buy thing.  But, let me tell you the sequence of events that ultimately cemented my decision to return.I received the package in the evening on a Saturday night.  Quickly and excitedly, I tried the dress on.  After I took it off I hung it on a hook on my wall.  From Sunday evening till Tuesday morning, all I could smell was what reminded me of a greek yogurt throw up bomb.  I couldn't figure out where the smell was coming from.  I washed all of my bedding, checked my carpet to make sure one of my dogs didn't leave me a special surprise.  I put my nose to literally everything in my room just trying to figure out WTF smelled so sour.It wasn't until I picked the dress up again to make my decision that I realized the smell of death was coming from the garment in my hands.Signed, sealed, delivered back to you Amazon.  Whatever died in this dress is going to need an exorcism.

Love this jacket BUT, its bigger than the red medium one I bought. And a different, thicker material. Strange. But maybe itll shrink after I wash it. Keeps me warm and is good in harsh weather. Bigger hood than the red one as well which is a huge plus.
Made such a handsome dude look even cuter.  Better than you could expect renting those crazy priced tuxes!  The fit is great and you get to keep it for more than a few days!

Perhaps i should have gotten two sizes smaller, but the knees on these were baggie by lunch.
they are very soft and comfortable, but i wouldn't buy them again.

These are cute but they are about two sizes too big. I normally wear 26 501s and I could fit 24 in these. Size down.
No comfort due to a very tight crotch seam. Same problem on larger sizes. I returned all 3 sizes I tried.

I'm literally wearing an athletic tank top and some fun bike shorts with this adorable cropped blazer. I got a size 16 and it fits me well. For reference, I'm 5' 5" and 193 lbs. I tried using a belt to cinch the waist a bit, but it ended up looking really awkward. Would love some belt loops with a tie to add some sort of "waist" or at least to secure the open flaps from moving about so much. The cinched sleeves are just meh to me - the way they are cinched just seems awkwardly executed. Aside from those issues, I really like that I can throw this on over a tank top and be video meeting appropriate.

The fit of this top is nothing like in the photo. the blouse on the model must be pinned back to achieve that fitted silhouette. in reality this top is baggy and boxy and runs at least one size large. the embroidery, details, and soft material are great, but the fit is off entirely. this item is going back.

I am sorry to say this blouse is way below all retailer standards. this top should have been placed on sale a long time ago! poor quality in cut, fabric, design. this is a top one would grab at a local box store for 19.99. the colors are not as vibrant. the shoulders ill fitted. and the fabric and threads are very cheap. i was expecting so much more.sorry retailer.....my favorite store to shop!

Was a little disappointed in the material of these shorts. They seem very thin I’m hoping they don’t get pulls in them. Maybe that is why they were priced so low. I was expecting under armor to be more durable.
I bought the ivory sweater. lovely color and softness. the zipper is a great, unique feature that i love. the bottom has a wavy shape with extra fabric - definitely creates a bell shape.

The photo misrepresents how large this sweater is. it is giant! petite ladies stay away from this sweater. i ordered an xs and usually can manage to fit in a regular xs, but this just floored me. the neckline wouldn't even stay up on my upper body, it was that loose. also the width of the sweater does not at all hug the body as shows on the model. it is like a tent. i'm so bummed. the color blue is nice and the sweater is really soft. it's too bad it doesn't fit smaller women.
I am a size 2 and the skirt fit however it is so thick and voluminous, it looked like a pirate sack. it's unfortunately going back.

Purchased this dress to wear to new orleans in may...perfect with sandals for casual and dinner. so sad that it was not as i had hoped. the fabric is a bit heavy, and the sleeves are very tight (i have thin arms). the color is a bit "off," as the background color is a gray, which doesn't flatter the yellow design. i purchased the large, as this size usually fits me with a bit of flow, but it was very tight all around, especially around the bust area. going to have to return this...

I received this yesterday and the fit for me is so strange...to tight in the bust and the arms were to big for me..i am so bummed...the arms do not stay on my shoulders. i have many tops but maeve and they fit me well..this is the first one i have to return. this top is made well and i do recommend, but it should be tried on before purchasing as it is pricey if it does not fit you!
Great product, fits as expected.

I'm torn here, this is 4-5 stars as a garment, but 3 stars as a dress. Why? Because it clearly looks like a nightgown and I can't really imagine wearing it in public. It is super soft and comfortable, so go for it if you're looking for some house clothes or have less shame than me. It does seem to fit large, I'm 5' and 115lbs and almost always a small, but the xs seemed fine.

I love everything bordeaux so when i saw this one i knew i needed to try it and it's my favorite top from this brand ever. i hope they keep the style and offer it in all of the colors going forward. it's a very flattering style for anyone - accentuates shape without being tight or clingy and the stripes are lovely. also the material is so soft. i have not washed it yet so i hope it stands up to wash and wear well. overall this is an amazing top. it runs slightly large. i'm usually an xs in tops

I just love all pilcro pants. they are great for any occasion, any type of weather. i am 5'5" 125 lb. and i wear a 27 in all pilcro pants and they fit perfectly. only bummer is that i have to iron them, but they iron easily. length of these pants is just a tad long, but i can wear wedges with them and that solves the problem.

Really loved this dress online and was excited to try it out. when it arrived it was heavy & bulky in the package which didn't bode well. taking it out of the bag, i was surprised at how heavy & thick it was. the picture really looks like it would be a flowy, grecian dress to throw on during a hot summer day ? but in the reality you might drown in sweat. the interior linings promised absolutely no breathing fabric.

wanted to love this as the style is very cute but was disappointed by the mate
It was not one hundred percent  linen. 35% cotton, 20% Viseose, 45% Linen
Definitely shorter than expected, but a super light, airy, and comfy dress for summer nights. a must for summer dinner parties!!!

Recently started loving rockets. i own a pair in black and a pair that are distressed. i've found that the 27s fit me best. i am 5'7", 34c, 28 waist. this particular pair seems to run true to size, meaning i could get the 28s on (which is typically what i wear in other brands), but the 27s were embarassingly too small. while the 28s fit, and are made of a great weighty denim, with very little stretch, the wash was really not appealing. due to the distressing of the wash, all the lines butterfly
nice but size L pants 3 in too long so you step all over them

This top runs a bit small, but it's very pretty. i got the ivory and it's beautiful, very form fitting. it is a bit see thru so i will probably wear a tank under it. it's simple tshirt material, so i feel like it should be a bit less $.

I bought this sweater online and was surprised by how thick and fluffy it is. this is a warm and cozy sweater, more bulky than oversized. pattern has a comic book-style art look. it has raglan sleeves and a boxy cut and narrows a bit at the waist. cute, warm sweater for winter--wore with an undershirt.

Cute, basic white shirt with nice detail. i love meadow rue and this is another great shirt from them. while i love it, i wish it were just a little bit softer (i am a sucker for soft things). however, i am keeping the shirt and it will be great for work or play.
As usual these sweaters fit and look as advertised.  Please try to get the V-Necks in stock also.
Keeps me nice and cool all day long

Ordered this coat in a small. it is meant to be a slouchy and the fit is perfect - i'm 5'5" and weigh around 120. the sleeves are slightly longer than 3/4. the fabric is so soft, the coat is unlined and drapes beautifully. this coat reminds me of a coat my mother had when i was a child.... she referred to it as her 'car coat'... i believe that was a style then. worth the $.
This set is cute and fit as expected. The shorts are scratchy. I'm hoping after several washes they will soften up.
Cheap, thin, not wrinkle free, and about as soft as burlap

Oh dear. the elastic waistband just ruined this skirt for me--it made it look so cheap. i assumed from the photograph that the skirt was a knit over a structured lining with a real waistband with a zip. instead, it's a sweatshirt knit with no lining and elastic. it looked cheap and hung a bit baggy from the elastic waist, making it a no-go for me.

This dress is so unique, and is high quality. it came nicely packaged, and unfolded with no wrinkles. i bought it as a cool summer dress for events, and it fits the bill. i wore it once, and received many compliments. the only issue, is that you cannot take even medium size steps wearing this dress. a side slit would have solved the problem, but that would not have deterred me from buying it. the straps for the slip underneath are great, so that i could adjust it so my bra would not show.

After the second wash, the stitching in the armpits completely fell apart. after sewing it back up, wearing it, and washing it a third time, the stitching in the other armpit completely fell apart as well. not sure if this was just a fluke, but it was very disappointing. now that both armpits are sewn and all other stitches are intact, i must say that this is a great dress. i would have returned the dress to retailer, but i've already washed and worn it, so again...very disappointing. i would say

I love this dress as far as the fit goes. it makes my curvy figure loook even better with how it's cut. that being said the different patterns over each boob made the dress look crazy. it makes you look quite lopsided in the chest. wasn't just me, but my store people also agreed. had the pattern on the chest been the same it would be great, but even though my boobs are of "mostly" equal size, they looked too crazy. it's quite noticeable on. so sad:(

I'm tall with long legs, long arms, and a small chest, and the medium fits me almost perfectly. i love the long sleeves (sleeve length is always a challenge for me) and how the coat accommodates my broad shoulders. my only problem is that the belt wraps around my lower ribs and looks odd. if i can get the belt loops lowered 1.5-2 inches, it will be perfect. if i can't, i'll return it because the coat looks much better with the belt tied if it's buttoned up. one small point: the coat arrived incr
This a great looking jacket but I did send it back because it was so stiff.  I was looking for more of a relaxed fit.  It did fit size wise as expected just not as comfortable as I wanted.
Product runs small, quite small in the legs and seat.
Good quality jacket.very light ! And fit perfectly as described!

This dress is so beautiful in person. i actually am currently wearing it with jeans and i get so many compliments on it. this picture on the website does not really do it justice. very flowy beautiful top/dress.
i do really like very much
Pants fit loose missed return date now stuck with something Incan not use

I wanted to love this. couldn't wait for it to arrive.  unfortunately, it doesn't look anything like the picture.  i usually wear a m/l in holding horses so i ordered a l but as soon as i held it up i noticed it was ridiculously large. the fabric is on the heavy side so the dress just hangs in a very unflattering way. and, it is extremely shimmery.  i love velvet, but the texture and sheen of this dress was just over the top. sadly, it is going back.

So i love pilcro, i wear them all the time and usually size down because they "grow" after wearing them. i tried on my usual size in these and felt like they are too tight, not sure if they will get any looser. the material feels really good, lightweight and the stripes are subtle but cute. not sure if i'll keep them or maybe size up,
The suit arrived in such a small package that everything was so wrinkled. I brought a large but when I put it on it was so tight that I thought the buttons would pop off.
The pants came with a hole in the seam of the pants. Not his quality, especially for the price.

This is an amazingly soft and gorgeous sweater. i typically avoid this brand because most of their pieces run smaller on my frame however this not only fit perfect but it is a beautiful color as well! i prefer transitional pieces that can be worn multiple seasons and this one is just right.
We’ve had these pants for 3 weeks and they already have a hole in the knee.

Just thought I’d mention the pants fit very well. I have to re-order a 36 waist instead of 34. I may have just got fatter since I bought a pair of pants last but the 34’s seemed tight. Belt loops are definitely smaller than all my other pants. My everyday belt is pretty wide and wouldn’t fit. Just had to use a smaller belt. Otherwise I like everything about these. I always hated dickies standard size pants because they felt like balloons around my legs and bell bottoms but these slim fit style fit great more like the jeans I wear.
After reading other reviews i ordered a small. my usual size is a m. it was huge all around. it's a beautiful print but i think it would make a nice maternity top.

This is an okay blazer. There isn't a button to fasten it at the waist, and it fits a little baggy. The color orange, however, is way too bright. I feel like a traffic cone in it. Not my cup of tea, but if you like super bright colors, then this color is for you!
I can't fit into them without them being like a second skin.  Run small.  And are not sweat material but are very light material.
The color of the shirt is nice the fit of the shirt is nice it just messes everything up without a button
I bought for my brother. He liked but he mentioned that the material felt cheap. But it fitted right.
I liked the pants but for blue they are really dark, almost black.

I bought both black and white shirt. white is see through completely. black is ok. but the material is still too thin. i feel like it is going to tear after the first wash. not worth the money. i bought plenty of similar shirts from the same brand and this run is way too cheap.
The quality of the fabric is so bad and I don't think it's cotton at all. Probably soon it'll fall apart soon

This dress is stunning.  it is a great classic, that i wished had worked out for me.  i went through 3 different dresses, and each time, the cap sleeve would tear.  there is not much room, if at any for arm movement without the fabric tearing.  i am so disappointed.  it wasn' even tearing on a seam (so there was no way to repair it).  if you do not intent to dance in this dress and are wearing it for a low key night or dinner, it would most likely work....it is not for a wedding with dancing!

I am a true size xl. in my 20s i wore a small and then medium, so i know whereof i am speaking here. i tried this dress on in my local retailer store. this designer, as a handful of retailer designers seem to do, simply enlarges the fabric measurement outward as they add another size. the problem is... a funny thing happens to women's breasts as they gain weight. is this so difficult to understand? as a size small i was an a cup, as a medium i was a b cup. now, years later, as a size 16 i am a d cup
These shorts are so comfy, true to size, love the color. 10/10 recommend these

I really wanted this shirt to work -- the fabric is really cool -- but sadly the cut was just way off. i'm 5'10", and the shirt was much shorter on me than on the model, and the cut was just too wide under the armpits.

I absolutely love the look and fit of these jeans. i did have to size down. i ran into problems after washing. the fraying on one leg was twice that of the other, looking very unbalanced. after looking closely i found that one leg had a top stitching very close to the fray to prevent further fraying. the other leg did not have this stitching, thus the fraying double in size. i have sent a request to customer service for a replacement pair. these are adorable jeans just be sure to check for stitc
It’s so soft and fits perfect! Now I got two of them!
T-shirt was too short.
The material was awful

I saw this online & wondered abt the sleeve length on me. i was thinking about ordering the petite size since i'm only 5'3". sometimes cardigans have longer sleeves than i want. it was at the local store so i tried on the regular xs in the grey. the fit & sleeve length was fine. what i didn't care for was a slight itchiness (wool fiber) & some mild shedding (alpaca fiber). i decided against it but it is nice looking. 5"3", 117#
Too short:/
These don't fit right or have the proper material but they're pants I guess. Not jeans

I don’t like the fact that the red bled off under my arms to my white shirt. First time wearing it. It fit great however I’ve only worn it once bc it bled out. I would love to give them a 5 star bc I need a red blazer and it’s comfy. Maybe after this wash it won’t bleed then I’ll come back and update my review.

Besides the fact that this coat (which I waited a while for and looked very forward to getting) feels like brushed cardboard and has an arm length that gives me a certain Herman Muster quality - - this damn thing split up pretty much every seam on the cheap inside liner. Shredded seams up each sleeve, up the back, and side. I am being honest, this coat is an absolute piece of GARBAGE. And I feel bad that I even wasted money on it now because I just wanted a plaid blazer and this was probably made in some sweatshop somewhere.
Fit perfectly!
Fit and quality are excellent for the price. Photos showed a somewhat faded orange/ peach but the shirt is very bright (loud).
I recieved the product but the tie was missing. had to return

These are light and airy and pretty. they also tore the third time i wore them and not on a seam - a little above the knee while i was lying in my bed.

they also do not slim the figure and the fabric is slightly see-through as it is so thin, therefore if you are looking for serious lounge pants - great - i would not leave the house in them... or turn over in bed in them.

when i sit, the slits fall down around my thighs. my son complimented my dress the other day because the slits give way
I ordered this online in a sz 4, perfect fit and very comfortable. the side slits make it even more interesting since jeans or leggings will show!
Yeah. Lol. Definitely runs on the small side. The material is very thick, not breathable, and uncomfortable. I don't like it at all.
The XXL was more like A4X XL Can you use for a blanket
These pajama pants are really nice, excellent quality and very soft!!  Perfect for lounging around the house.  I like them so much that I bought 2 pairs!!  This product will not disappoint!!!

Like another reviewer mentioned, this shirt is way too short. i'm only 5'2" (xs) and there is no way this top would tuck in like on the model. also, the quality isn't great as it's very thin and there are strings hanging from some of the seams in the front. it's a shame b/c the print is really pretty and there is this cute little bicycle charm on the tag which makes it feel more unique. sadly, it's going back!

I like the feel and color of this blouse. however, i was very disappointed with the sizing. i usually wear medium so i ordered medium for this blouse, it fits way too big. it is a bummer because the "curve" is not even visible when i wear it.

I'm all over this trend, but this vest is quite thick/poufy, and on me i feel like it triangles out and all you see is furball. i love it - but i think you need some height for this to look its best. on me, a sweater vest would perhaps be better. i am chesty. but i cant decide. its really cute! if you're taller than 5'4" don't hesitate.
Package clearly had been previously opened and re-sealed with tape

I loved the style of this shirt so much that i bought two of them. unfortunately after washing the turquoise one, it sprang several holes. the same thing happened to the second one after one wash! i purchased several of these shirts in the tank style over this past summer, and they have washed and worn great. i think the fabric quality and craftsmanship has gone way downhill at retailer lately. very disappointed.
It’s very comfortable, light, and a great value for the price
Very thin, cheap fabric, the quality is not as good as I expected. After my son wore it once, the knees of the pant had faded. Disappointed at Carters.
I love this shirt. The fabric is soft and it is so comfortable. I usually wear XLarge, but the large fits better.
The item overall did fit, but the length was shorter than anticipated.
Returned item twice and was unable to get size I ordered for my husbands birthday. Very disappointed. Shirt looks like it would of been nice.
Nicely finished, unexpectedly weighty cotton with a soft hand. Good stitching, solid buttonholes and good collar. I'll buy more.
I liked the shorts but I can't figure out why two fits in one don't
Extraordinario

I love anna sui's lines makeup to everything. this dress is beautiful in a very usual sort of way and after trying it on, i couldn't see anything spectacular that made it unique or special somehow. the elastic waist does make this dress forgiving and it runs big. the hem is lovely scalloped. each detail is very nice in and of itself but when put together in this dress, there is no wow that justifies the full price tag. now that it's on sale i'll keep it probably for summer.

Bought this top at my local store and tried it on as soon as i got home. yikes! it was way too billowy, i looked like i was pregnant. will be trying the next size down on in the store to see if it is billowy.
Great fitting shirt, style and price.
Don’t wash them lmao they will shrink

At first i was taken by the beautiful lacework and the pictures online showing what appeared to be a loose but shaped silhouette. the pictures must have been staged with pins in the back because, in person, the shirt fits like a circus tent. without exaggeration, there is a surplus of about 16 inches.

the material is still beautiful. and because of that, i haven't decided whether i'll return this shirt or try cutting out some excess fabric to create a cleaner, more fitted shape.
Ameeee la tela, el color, es tan suave. Impecable. Solo en su talla pido 1 menos para mi. Fue más de lo que quería

I nearly always wear a size small, and sometimes even a small is too large. not in this case; this top is extremely snug. i would not be able to wear this, and i would've returned for a larger size but the ivory color was a little too yellow for me. in the online photo. the color is more of an off-white than ivory yellow. i'm guessing also that this fabric may not stand the test of time and easily snag. but that's just conjecture.
Loved the length since I'm just 5' 1". It's very flattering. Needs a strapless bra. A little tight in the bust and arms, but not enough to return. Have worn it 3 times.
Jacket fits perfect. True to size but I still don’t know why it comes with a rock 🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️🤷🏻‍♀️
SOO cute! Love!!

I really like this pullover. the design is beautiful, and i love the asymmetrical hem. my own complaint is that the fit is a bit boxy on me because i'm large-chested. it's more drapey than tailored. but it's not overwhelming and doesn't cancel out how much i like it overall.
Not slim fit

Frankly I didn’t even try it on, because I could tell that 1) the pants would be too long and too baggy (if the rest had been ok the plan was to get some skinnier pants); and 2) the top jacket thing was far longer than I wanted; and 3) I would have looked like my grandmother. And I ain’t no spring chicken!

I purchased in white. the material is a little thinner than i like, but the material is soft. runs tts over all. the arms are long-but i like this in a t-shirt. i will probably pick up another color in this shirt.

I was looking for a lightweight top to wear with black linen trousers to a party, i was not sure of this top seeing it on a slender model (i am a more typical 50 year old mom body) and i have never worn a peplum style. i put it on for my husband and approved, so i wore it. i received many compliments - a few from good friends who congratulated me for going out of my 'comfort zone' with the style!
Impressed with the quality and feel especially for 22 bucks shipped. Whish size S did not fit like size M.
I bought this in January have worn it 5 times at most and it’s already broken by the collar
It fit great just the around the waist is just the smallest issue but a belt can fix it

Really cute and very comfortable. material is thin and sheer. i wear tanks under things anyway, but especially in pink, you would need to. but love the style.

The zippered pocket broke after a few months of infrequent wear. Big bummer, since that’s what I got them for (the zippered pocket). The top of the pocket came lose at the end after use and then the zipper zipped right off and became lost. Cheap quality. Would not buy this product again.
Run very LARGE. and VERY long!! Do not shrink but stretch out even more. Waste of money.....

Definitely not as good quality as Nike. They’re fine, but I won’t repurchase. I would say they run true to size or possibly a little small.
I ordered both the medium and small and the fit was huge.

High quality, yummy soft fabric, gorgeous color. even with those three pros, this jumpsuit is not for me. i am 5'2" and 150 lbs, size 10-12 m/l in the lines that retailer carries. i own one of their jumpers and it is very flattering! this one, however has capri pants, hits awkwardly at the midsection and makes my torso look even more square. on a tall, thin woman, it probably works!

I liked the color of this top but i didn't really like the ruffled stitching around the middle. it looks like someone just tacked on the bottom half. i bought this for my daughter and she likes it. i think it is comfortable and a good top to knock around in.

I agree with the other reviewers about the versatility and the fit of the dress. i am 5'9" and yes the pockets hit just a tad high, but the fit of the bodice and bust is so great that i am willing to overlook this small flaw. the only thing that has really bothered me about the dress, that i haven't seen anyone else comment on is the slightly strange odor from the denim. maybe it just happens to be my particular dress, but i have noticed this strange smell from a pair of seven jeans i had purcha

I had high hopes for these, but they didn’t work! They’re extremely high waisted which isn’t flattering for curvy girls. Completely see through.

Overall this is a great shirt. Though, not as great as the Calvin Kline version I can no longer find. I've bought several in different colors over the last year and as yet, have not had one come apart on me though I feel a few have shrunk.  I really like that they don't thread a plastic tag through the product and instead opt for a clip akin to a safety pin. There are several tags attached to this pin, they do not contain washing instructions despite having plenty of places to print that information. Printed on the inside of the shirt there are what appear to be washing symbols. I've had several young people try to explain these symbols to me but their expressive interpretive dances have failed to successfully communicate the proper instructions. On the upside, they seem to like to touch the shirt and while doing so they give way to soft cooing and purring noises that soon have fingers pulling and tugging to remove all clothing. Though I've had no complaints personally, I would very much like these shirts to be thicker and I would pay more for a thicker version. In the meantime, I've emailed the archeological department of the local university in hopes of bringing these symbols to an egyptologist who caught my fancy when I stumbled into their lecture by accident. My hope is that their knowledge of ancient hieroglyphics can shed some light on the symbols of my shirt and I would be interested to know if these shirts are as soft as Egyptian cotton. Fortunately, there appear to be a great number of strangers happy to do my laundry, but they can be quite aggressive about it, thus leading to my aforementioned stumbling.

I really loved the pattern and style of this dress! unfortunately, i had to return it because i have broad shoulders and it is a pretty stiff top that cut into the flabby area near my armpits. for most people it's probably perfect! but if you have wide shoulders or any concerns about the armpit flab, this might not be a great choice for you.
The top fit looser than expected making it look and feel sloppy.
My favorite pair of jeans. Very comfortable and stylish.
I  love this dress so much! It's a beautiful color and hangs so well BUT it started pilling really badly on the very first use :( shame because it's not even that cheap.

I have been a big fan of this canadian designer so when i saw the sweater on the web, i immediately ordered it. on the website, it looks very modern and edgy chic. i was heartbroken when i saw it in person. when i opened the bag and put on the sweater, i noticed a lot of little black marks on the bathroom floor. it came from the sweater. size small was swimming on me and the holes on the shoulders, which supposed to look modern...well, the thin cheap material the sweater looks like it's ripped.
Runs a little on the smaller side.If I purchased again I go a size or two larger.

I love everything about this sweater. it is very well made, beautiful material and such an effortless way to pull it all together. it runs large which was unfortunate for me as i bought the xs petite and i really need xxs in this one, but none are left. i am 5 ft. tall and weigh about 96 pounds. i can wear a 0 but not in this sweater. it runs very well and i highly recommend it. hope they make more in this style. it is so fresh looking and so comfortable.
Didn't fit, didn't get the color I ordered and there was no stretch whatsoever

I do like this sweater, but didn't try on due to verk dark foundation makeup all over the front of the outer neck and some on inner crew neck!! So gross!!! Plus one of the wrists was covered with same makeup!! Plus it smelled awful! Like old lunch!! I don't mind buying second hand, but not at full price!! My first instinct was to scrub with laundry spot remover! It's in the washer now!! If it still smells it will go back! Contacting Customer Service over this!! I'm angry at myself for not photographing first..I just was stunned and got it in the laundry room as fast as I could!! It smells like the kitchen of a very ethnic restaurant I worked in decades ago!!

I originally purchased this in my usual retailer size 6 (vanity size lol), and was nervous that the neck would be tight, based on the other reviews. however, once i tried it on i realized that in my usual size the body was a little too wide and didn't create any shape. i ended up exchanging for and keeping a size 4 and it fits much better in the body and i did not have a problem with any tightness in the neck in either size. for reference i'm 5'7", 36dd 135lbs.

i would say this items runs true
This suit fit my son perfectly. He looked so nice in this suit. It is quality material, made nicely, I loved the adjustable waist because he’s so skinny. Very happy with this purchase.

Even though both pants are tagged 505-Regular and W: 38;  I: 32, one of the pants was extralarge, at least 2 sizes larger in waist (W42), the pants are now 5000 miles down south from the US, so there is no way to return them due to airfreight, dispatch and clearance costs. Regards, Hermann

Bought this as an inner layer for a rain shell for a trip to Iceland and it kept me warm and toasty through cold and rainy weather.  When zipped up all the way it is actually quite comfortable and doesn't hit the underside of the chin. Just one day I tried a cashmere layer instead of this and was very cold.  Fleece any day for me from now on.  It's also very flattering and the pink (mauve?) is a lovely color.

I purchased these pants in blue, they fit great - only problem is that one leg is about 1/2 inch longer than the other. i got them on sale with a discount so i will keep them and take them to a tailor to fix. bummer.

I bought these for my husband, and he likes them a lot. They fit as expected and are very comfortable. I wouldn’t waste my money buying them again.

Quality and fit is perfect.

I ordered this in the china pattern color, and the colors are vibrant and beautiful! the suit is well made and slimming. there are no bra cups; just a shelf bra, but the tie halter adds some extra support. i have trouble buying bathing suits, but i am very happy with this one.

I loved the colors (especially the pink) and thought this would be really pretty. however, when i received it, its much shinier with is a very thin material and is a bit of a retro in a not nice way feel to it. i also found it huge. normally, i wear an xxsp or a 00p (for reference i am 5'2, 30e and 24 in waist. i tried both the xxsp (fit better but was too short) and the xxs (too large). i had hoped this would have more shape and would be more fitted, but its definitely not.
Best jumpsuit ever! so soft and always gets compliments! get one now before they're gone. also it is supposed to be tied in front! i'm 5'3" and the small petite is just perfect!

Not what i was expecting, but pleasantly surprised.  was envisioning a more structured/tailored trouser, but these are closer to leggings, albeit very substantial ones with "real pant" touches like a zip/button front and (faux) pockets.  they're form fitting, soft yet supportive, stretchy, incredibly comfortable, and tts.  i'm a pretty legit 10 in pants (30/31), and the 10's near perfect, with the rise coming right to my belly button.  think i'll grab another pair now while they're available.

This dress is so vibrant in person. i am 5'10" and the length is perfect. having a small waist helps too. certainly worth the $49 i spent on it. watch the sales. several times ill go to pay for an item, and its even cheaper that advertised. the uniqueness that retailer embodies is what i love the most about their clothing. i'm a size 10, ordered a medium

Perfect sweater to throw on with anything. it is fairly thin, i wore a cami underneath. the sleeves and hem are rolled. you have to be careful and it can snag easily. happy with my purchase.

Love the blue color, and the bit of sparkle gives this otherwise casual piece a bit of flair. the hem is cool. love the big cuffs. but i looked like the liberty bell in the small. it is huge through the hips! not at all like on th model. i also worried it would shrink and i would lose the length in the arms. returned :(

The reason I'm returning is that it's longer in the front and falls over the waistband, but because the back is plain and not pleated and blousy, it appears to sit higher up. So I look like I have sagging belly in the front. If it was loose all the way around the hem then I would keep it. Maybe a larger busted person would fill out the front so it doesn't do thatColor was nice as described.
Too small and the fabric shape was weird

I just got this Tuxedo set for my baby nephew in the mail. When I opened the package, I only received 2 pieces without the white shirt and the bow tie. The jacket has small pieces of hair all over it. Will return ASAP.

After reading every review, i was certain i knew exactly what i was getting with this dress. wrong. i sized up from a small to a medium and the dress was still uncomfortably tight on my rib cage. the top is very exposing of the bust, and i'm small busted. i can't stand wearing camis, so there no way i'd be able to wear this dress even if i sized up again to a large. for reference, i'm 5'6", a straight build 134 lbs, and wear a 6. pluses on this dress are, i loved the green color and length of sk

Since we've been experiencing much colder than normal winter temperatures in the Seattle area this year, I thought a warm set of pajamas would be useful. If the power went out for more than a day, they'd be perfect, but these PJs are definitely too warm, even when outside temps fall to the low teens.They are indeed soft and very comfortable for lounging about, and will be great should I ever have to sleep on the couch!  The fit is as advertised, pants cuffs are elastic enough to not droop, but aren't too tight.
It looks exactly the same as shown, I just didn’t really look close enough, but you’ll need a tank or a camisole or something underneath.
Fabric is too thin.

These felt really stiff out of the bag, so I checked the label to make sure they were 100% cotton as advertised. The label confirmed they are 100% cotton. With wear they become softer and I've had them for a couple weeks. They're not top of the line pajamas, but they're comfortable. They feel fine and are pretty sturdy too so they won't wear out as fast as most pajamas.
I got fooled by this dress's description. it's 100% polyester and not wool as it claims to be! looks cheap.returned it!
Más pequeño de lo esperado
I tried on this top and it looked fine until i tried to move. you can't lift your arms. i tried on a larger size but still felt like the movement was limited in the back and arm areas.

I've had a lot of misses from retailer lately. i've loved this dress since i first saw it in the spring/summer releases and gave it a try when it went on sale. when it arrived i literally lol. it's an ill fitting nightgown. the size small was a tent on me and it's so flimsy and sheer it probably shouldn't be worn in public. there's a short sheer slip that comes with it but unfortunately doesn't do much. pass, ladies.
The fun colors drew me to this but it sure fit weird. the top was fine but it became a bit tent-like in the waist. the material doesn't feel great either.

I normally don’t do this, but I bought these less then a month ago and there is a hole already next to the pocket. I’ve worn them maybe 6 times now I have to find a new pair of pants and I’m out 30 bucks

Ordered two 2-packs, each the same size.  Received two packages, each marked with the ordered size.  One package contained the correct size, but the other had both shirts one size smaller, even though the package was marked correctly.  Tried to return just the wrong one, but the seller couldn’t manage that, so I had to send ‘em all back.  Too bad, ‘cause I liked the ones that were correct.  Oh well.  Five stars for the good shirts, minus one for the inadequate customer service.
I’d rather spend the extra coin on a zara blazer. This is cheap and looks cheap as well. Wouldn’t use in a professional setting.

This jacket started to rip and fall apart after the first day. Holes in pocket and tore at the seams where they tried to make it look contour to your back and shoulders.I looks so stylish but I am afraid it may come apart some day while wearing it.
it's a good product.
These pants run large. I wore them into work once and received comments that it looked like I was drowning in them.

I love these joggers. they are stylish, comfortable and high quality. my one complaint is that the sizing appears different for different colors. 

i got them in the green/moss color,. i immediately wore them casually with flats, a t, & a long silver necklace. that night, i literally just changed into a long, flowy silk cami and high suede black shoes with the joggers and wore them out- feeling comfy and pulled together (favorite combination). 

i loved them so much i decided to try the othe

It's not a bad concept but i wished for more. i wish this tunic was a: different material as it was wrinkley and drop-waist design instead of at the waist. too bad. i wanted to love it but it will go back.
Oddly shaped and oversized.

BEWARE - shirt is NOT as pictured.  I wanted to purchase a cotton nightshirt with the white piping detail on the collar and pocket, as that is the type he likes.  I ordered the navy blue one with the white piping and sailboat design ("peacoat").  I received the "correct" one  (sailboat design, not the anchor design) but it was missing the white piping.  I am really disappointed with this purchase, as the piping really adds to the overall look.  Unfortunately, as my father needed a new nightshirt ASAP, I opted to keep the item out of necessity.  Otherwise, I would have returned it for a refund.
The fit is perfect!
Good design, comfortable fit. however, sizing is way off. i am a 34c and the small fits with minimal support. agree with the previous review. not sure it is a keeper.
Love these shorts! Great for under dresses or with a t shirt

The design is very strange. the inner slip is quite form-fitting, but the dress on top was just massive, like a sack. on the sides were tassels that i could not figure out what to do with. they looked weird just hanging off the side, so i tried to knot them like a belt. overall, this dress was not attractive on. it looks much better on the model. the coloring on the snakeskin print dress is also different in real life, harsher red, blue, and white print not the dusty rose and plum pictured.
I’m a female who prefers to wear men’s Levi’s. They just for me better. These for exactly like I want them to.

I love this tee but there is a lot of swing/ fabric so it can tend to make you look wide. also, i have a short torso to begin with but this tee is on the short side. i'm still undecided on whether i'm going to keep it b/c it's rayon/ poly and it's hand wash only. and i'm worried that one wash will make it shrink in length and it's already short. rayon knits have a tendency to shrink in length when washed so beware!
Gd fit, liked the shape. Size lrg
Dress just did not fit will around the hips.  also the string belt was defective - basically about to come off.  looks like someone may have wore it and returned it.  was not flattering at all.

It is soooo cute!!! i'm trying to figure a few things before deciding to keep..... how one goes to the bathroom when wearing it? i can't figure out how to get it on without help tying the straps in the back?
I ordered a 3xl and they fit me like a medium. Quality was there but size description WAY OFF

I love the waistband of the shorts, the material and the zippered pocket... but the leg holes are WAY too big.  The waist fits very comfy, so I don't want to size down.  I have two more dislikes...the seams in the inseam...they rub my inner thighs.  Lastly, I would prefer the built in undershorts to be more of an hipster underwear cut vs boy shorts.  It's just too much material.
This jacket runs very large. i usually wear an xl but probably could fit into a medium. i have long arms, and the sleeves were way past my hands. i love the jacket, but it's just too sloppy.

The best thing about these jeans is the denim is quality and they are super soft just not a great fitting cut for me.  Definitely worth it if they fit you well.  I just wasn't that lucky. I generally wear Levi's 511, 527, &517 athletic cut .
The dress is pretty, i ordered a 4 and 6 not knowing how it ran, i took both back the neck is too tight!

Took the step in ordering my first pair of mom jeans and I was so sad these didn’t work out! I’m 5’6 and normally wear a 27 regular in Levi’s. I originally ordered my normal size and couldn’t get them past my thighs. I exchanged and went with the recommended size of a 29 and they were still uncomfortably tight around my thighs and wouldn’t pull all the way up. When I finessed them on the best I could, the waist was too loose. I felt like my legs were in a straight jacket when I walked around in them. Between them squeezing my thighs, flattening my butt, and being too loose around the waist — I’ll unfortunately be returning. Super cute, just not for my body type!

The fabric and drape of this blazer is beautiful. I bought the black in Large and the pink in XL, and both give the perfect oversized look. If you are wanting the same look as the model, order the XL. Once the blazer is ironed, it looks and feels way more expensive than it is. I plan to buy more colors!

When I saw this blouse on the site I fell in love with it. However, when I received it it did not fit, it was not true to size, the color and all was great but I had to return it and I don't like returning things, it was to small I did not want to get a bigger size so I just used the credit to purchase something else. I ordered it a 2x all my shirts are 2x but this one was to small so if you're planning on buying this blouse order it a little bigger than your regular size.
I suspected that the product quality may be an issue based on the price, but I took a chance.  It appears cheap (fabric, hang on the body, etc.).  Skip it and pay the money for a better blazer.

Bought these for my husband about a month ago, they ripped down the whole back-- this is so surprising from Wrangler Jeans because the others he has have lasted forever!  I dont know if these are not authentic or something but such a bummer, will not be ordering from here again for them!
What a let down. this is not what i would call a coat but a sweater. it is unlined and very lightweight. the fit was cute and would have been so great if it was actually a coat.
This tee is very fitted.  Not comfortable. Even my husband tried it and it was riégate in the chest and abs area.
Looks great!

I like having lightweight summer pajamas, and these are perfect. the print is so much cuter in person and the fabric is wonderfully silky. the pants themselves seemed to run a little bit small. i ordered them in xs and s and ended up keeping the small. overall a great purchase.
Great pants, great construction. The only thing to note is that the material is quite thick and it makes the pants a bit warmer than expected.

I liked the simple styling of these jeans when i saw them in the store. the price is right considering what some jeans cost today. unfortunately, these are made in china. that bummed me out. they run a tad bit small but in the end i think they are more true to size because they give especially in the waist. the higher waist is a nice change. it's nice to be able to skip a belt. the denim is a bit rough after air drying so i hope it softens up.
Pretty color, great stretch. Great color. A little soft but just feels like cheap very low quality polyester fabric. Blech and I’m no diva.  Happier with bamboo pajamas from Amazon.

I just received this in the green color. it is a true medium jade green. my monitor shows a blue color and that is what i expected. the green is pretty but i would have preferred the blue that was shown. i found this to fit large . the pockets that are barely visible in any of the photos gape open and don't lie flat. i do like this sweater as a very casual jacket alternative on cooler days. the cashmere is a nice weight and is not too precious to wear every day with jeans.
This dress would have been perfect in a medium petite. beautiful dress, wish i had sized down

The product was great…. The delivery was awful! My friend is on oxygen and very limited. The pkg was left at the mailbox …not at his door! He had to struggle to get it! Always before the items are delivered to his door.

I just got this at the black friday sale..... i may have passed it by had i not been in an adventurous mood ( i usually wear brighter colors). it feels wonderful....cozy and silky like expensive pjs!! looks very glamorous yet laid back... i feel like i am in a 40's romantic film.. i got a ps and it fits flowy. it was the only one so i was not able to try the xs. love it! it was cold today so i wore a cami under it with lace peeking thru the low neckline .
I like the stretch, cut, and fit of this shirt, but the texture of the material is quite coarse, and a little scratchy to those who are sensitive to that.
I returned this jacket. It was too big in all the wrong places but the sleeves were ridiculously short. I’m 5’9 and weigh around 135. The sleeves were too baggy and short and the coat itself was big

This jacket is a neutral color with a subtle print that adds great character. the stitching around the edges is cute. the shape is very flattering and not too boxy as some open jackets can be. a perfect layering piece!
This is a bad ass jacket fits great looks great keeps you warm recommend this to everyone

I found this dress to be very short waisted, much closer to an empire waist than shown in the picture. it was also an inch or two longer in the skirt than other maxi dresses i've gotten from retailer. it really could have used those inches above the waist. just a strange fit overall.
If you have larger muscular thighs this would be a good pants.  Just not the fit my husband wanted.

Do not buy these pants!  the first time i washed these pants i ended up with big faded spots, and i followed the washing instructions.  i bought another pair and the same thing happened.  i'm out a bunch of money!

Very disappointed. ordered two sizes, the fraying of the embroidery was so bad on one of the dresses i wouldn't have worn it and the zipper was sticking. the second dress had fraying and loose threads as well and the seams at the shoulders were not properly sewn which made the lace at the neckline completely crooked. some of these issues would maybe be acceptable if the dress was under $100 but at $228 they are not. returning both sizes.

I was aware of the split sleeves when i purchased-- hoping to try something new. they're not attractive. the slit stays open with any movement. i don't think it would be appropriate for work . overall the fit is true to size. i otherwise liked the design, but the sleeves made this a quick return ....
XL fit exactly as expected

So sad that this cardigan did not fit me. i listened to the review i read and tried a small, didn't come close to fitting. i tried a medium and it also did not fit. i think this item is designed for someone who has a small frame. i seem to be too tall for the item and too big in the chest. i usually always fit into a size medium.that being said the cardigan is very pretty and feminine, has an interesting design and is well made. so sad this item didn't work for me :-(
Very cute and good quality. It was just a hair shorter than I wanted so I wear shorts underneath

I ordered this in size xl in ivory. it was a drab, poorly-made, too-small sweater. the knit material wasn't good quality and the overall fit didn't work. i liked the light red color and maybe if that had been in stock, then i would have overlooked the problems. but, there are better ivory retailer cardigans available. this was returned.

be wary on sizing. i thought an xl would fit because i usually fit xl in stretchy pants/shorts. while the xl DOES fit my body, it has a slight rolling problem on the thighs and tummy. size up if you’ve got bigger thighs and a tummy! i assume that an xxl will fit me 100% perfectly! otherwise, products came as listed, good, breathable material!
beautiful design but didn't fit my body great. Might be best for the less curvy.
Chic and flattering, perfect fitting
Ordered 2x, fits like an xl and short. Im 6 7" 270lbs..to short and small, one wash ruins them

I wore this suit for the first time yesterday and the black inner lining is leaking and causing stains on the white sections. seriously bummed as this is a super lovely suit.

Should have ordered the xl instead of the large. didn't even come close to being able to button the front but i'm a 34 g. i find sanctuary to run small. beautiful soft green color, fabric is soft too. it is cropped to the waist. decided to return instead of reorder.
I was surprised at the high quality of fabric; however, the dress looked like a muumuu on. maybe with a belt it would be cuter...

Runs small.  Otherwise nice shorts
I ordered a 3 pack of large, black, brown & green.What I got was 2 medium & 1 large.They are OK for lounging but the medium are a bit tight.

I am normally a m-l (170 lbs, 5'4", 34dd). i ordered this top in a medium knowing it ran big, and it is huge. seriously, i could wear it as a dress. i like the whole loose and comfy top thing, but this is so massive it looks sloppy. i'm going try and return it for a small. hey, i like that i can wear a small! the green color really is pretty, and it's so soft. just need a much smaller size.
